description.hltext_display: Celebra Landeros liberación de El Jefe
description.content:
Pedro Escobedo, Qro.- El edil de Pedro Escobedo, Alonso Landeros Tejeida, dijo sentirse contento por la liberación de Diego Fernández de Cevallos, secuestrado hace 7 meses en el rancho La Cabaña, ubicado en este municipio.
Comentó con relación a la liberación del ex senador Diego Fernández de Cevallos, que como autoridad tenían conocimiento del tema, pero que estarían en espera de mayor información al respecto.
"Estamos enterados de la situación, mi director de Seguridad Publica me ha dado a conocer los pormenores de la situación, sin embargo hasta el momento no tenemos conocimiento", fueron las palabras del presidente municipal, quien posterior a esta entrevista de acuerdo a fuentes cercanas al mismo, permaneció en reunión con diversos funcionarios.
Y es que al ser cuestionado sobre dicho acontecimiento, el edil sólo manifestó que como autoridades se mantenían al margen y esperaba los informes que su director de Seguridad Pública le rindiera, pero se mantuvieron en reunión a fin de conocer los acontecimientos.
A pesar de las constantes llamadas realizadas para conocer su opinión e indagar más sobre el tema, hasta el cierre de esta edición, fuentes cercanas al mismo, informaron que el presidente municipal seguía en reunión a fin de conocer la situación y ver las medidas que se tomarán con respecto a la seguridad del municipio escobedense.
"Se mantienen en reunión tanto el presidente municipal como autoridades municipales, no sabemos hasta que hora vayan a terminar", comentaron a este medio de comunicación algunas fuentes.
Es importante mencionar, que a pesar de la información que se ha publicado en diversos medios de comunicación sobre la liberación de Diego Fernández de Cevallos, se ha informado que tanto ranchos vecinos a las propiedades de los familiares y del mismo Diego Fernández, existe una total calma.
Por lo que tampoco se ha observado la presencia de elementos policiacos de ninguna corporación, de tal forma que existe tranquilidad tanto en la cabecera municipal como en los alrededores del rancho, propiedad de Diego Fernández de Cevallos, quien después de siete meses de haber sido secuestrado, fue puesto en libertad, tras una negociación económica de su familia con sus captores.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: Fue por dinero y por política
description.content:
San Juan del Río, Qro.- Fines económicos, pero también políticos fueron las causas del secuestro del político Diego Fernández de Cevallos.
"Por un lado, desde luego, el reclamo de una cantidad, pero también tuvo una marcadísima connotación política, supuestamente por cuestiones ideológicas (...) Yo tengo la tranquilidad de conciencia de haber luchado siempre por mis ideales, siempre en Acción Nacional, siempre por México. No lo vieron así mis plagiarios, ellos me consideraron un enemigo de sus causas", confirmó el político recién liberado.
Al referirse al fin económico, expresó que "en buena medida, parte de la causa de mi secuestro es esa imagen proyectada de un hombre infinitamente rico. No lo soy. Punto".
En diversas entrevistas radiofónicas y en el noticiero de Joaquín López Dóriga, Fernández de Cevallos afirmó que su secuestro es uno más de los que se dan en este país, en donde "sólo podremos tener paz y tranquilidad cuando valgan lo mismo las vidas de un candidato a la Presidencia, de ex candidato, de un cura o cardenal, de un soldado o un campesino, cuando todas las vidas humanas nos valgan lo mismo y se respeten igual, de ricos y pobres, ese día México será grande".
Durante su plagio, dijo, dio cuenta de los diversos asesinatos y crímenes que se dieron en el país, incluso lamentó el asesinato "de la mujer de Chihuahua", al referirse a la activista Marisela Escobedo, además del asesinato del alcalde de Nuevo León y el candidato a gobernador de Tamaulipas.
Destacó lo afortunado de haber sido liberado por sus secuestradores, suerte que no corren todos los plagiados.
"Me duele saber lo que acaba de pasar en Chihuahua, en Monterrey, me duele que México siga teniendo violencia", al dar cuenta de cómo murieron diversos seres humanos "de la forma más violenta", durante el tiempo que estuvo secuestrado, mismo en el que reconoció "el trato que personalmente me dieron fue de absoluto respeto a mi dignidad humana independientemente del atropello brutal que la conducta misma del secuestro implica".
Fernández de Cevallos expresó en radio que "no viviré jamás como víctima del secuestro" y aclaró que accedía a las entrevistas, en agradecimiento al digno papel que jugaron los medios de comunicación para su liberación, ya que aclaró, "no podía ser ni majadero, ni mucho menos, ingrato".
"Si he sido tratado con gran profesionalismo, con gran responsabilidad y con gran mesura por los comunicadores y por las instituciones que representan, lo menos que podía hacer es dar la cara. No me podía esconder, no soy un hombre que se esconde de nada".
Ya por la noche de ayer, en el noticiero de Joaquín López Dóriga, "El Jefe Diego" insistió en que su secuestro fue por dinero y por casusas políticas. Además reveló que se comprometió con sus plagiarios en promover desde su trinchera política, causas justas para abatir la desigualdad e impunidad en México.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: Liberan a Diego
description.content:
El secuestro de Diego Fernández de Cevallos, se dio con fines económicos, aseguró el propio panista tras su liberación.
El Sol de San Juan del Río
Martha Romero y Armando Velazco
San Juan del Río, Qro.- En espera se encuentran María, Elena y Beatriz de que su hermano Diego Fernández de Cevallos tenga contacto con ellas, luego de 7 meses de haber sido plagiado y tras su aparición ayer, ante los medios de comunicación, para confirmar que se encontraba libre y a salvo.
Luego de la noticia, que dio la vuelta al país, fue constante la presencia de medios locales y nacionales en los ranchos que el panista tiene en Pedro Escobedo y San Juan del Río, sin embargo, la tranquilidad prevaleció durante toda la mañana, a excepción del Rancho San Germán, donde se encontraban reunidas las hermanas de "el Jefe" en espera de mayores noticias.
Afuera, en el rancho, esperan María, Elena y Beatriz, quienes habrían recibido a las 3 de la mañana las primeras noticias de la liberación de Diego Fernández de Cevallos, y desde entonces sus teléfonos celulares no dejaban de sonar.
Antes de haber visto por televisión a Diego Fernández de Cevallos, sus hermanas aseguraban que se encontraba a salvo, algo débil pero en general bien de salud; lo supieron por un amigo cercano de la familia, mediante el cual habrían de tener contacto directo con el ex senador.
"Desde las tres de la mañana nos hablaron para decirnos que ya lo habían liberado y que nos va a llamar para escucharlo, no sabemos a qué hora, será a la hora que él pueda pero ya es un hecho que está libre, nos confirmó un amigo de él y quien nos va a enlazar con nuestro hermano, estamos muy contentas y agradecidas con Dios", detalló Doña Elena, quien junto con sus hermanas permanecía sentada a las afueras de la Hacienda, respondiendo a los medios ahí reunidos.
Frente a una pequeña mesa, rodeada de hojarasca, las hermanas de Diego Fernández de Cevallos explicaron que por seguridad no se les habría informado del lugar dónde habría sido abandonado "el Jefe" ni del domicilio en el que habría de permanecer en las siguientes horas.
De acuerdo a Doña Elena, algunos amigos de Diego Fernández de Cevallos habrían tenido ya contacto con él, al igual que sus hijos y con el resto de sus hermanos, para confirmar que se encontraba vivo y a salvo, aunque insistió en que el político no habría confirmado aún el lugar en el que habrá de permanecer en las siguientes horas.
GRACIAS A DIOS ESTA A SALVO: ALFONSO FERNANDEZ
Entrevistado vía telefónica, Alfonso Fernández de Cevallos, también hermano de Diego Fernández, dijo sentirse aliviado y agradecido por la liberación del ex senador.
Descartó que el político pudiera regresar a alguno de sus ranchos (hasta ayer), pero insistió en que la familia en general se encuentra feliz por su regreso.
Mientras tanto, los Ranchos El Estanco y La Cabaña, donde fuera plagiado Diego Fernández de Cevallos, permanecieron ayer en total calma y sólo se apreciaba a algunos trabajadores quienes, dijeron desconocer la noticia de la liberación de "El Jefe".
PERMANECIO 7 MESES CAUTIVO
El político Diego Fernández de Cevallos fue secuestrado después de las once de la noche del 14 de mayo cuando de Querétaro llegaba a su rancho "La Cabaña", ubicada en las inmediaciones del municipio de Pedro Escobedo, en el Estado de Querétaro, por un grupo de personas que más tarde se hicieron identificar ante los medios y mediante comunicados como los "Misteriosos Desaparecedores".
Al conocerse oficialmente el secuestro del político, la familia de Fernández de Cevallos pidió a las autoridades se abstuvieran de investigar para facilitar las negociaciones con los secuestradores, lo que al parecer ocurrió de inmediato y por la propia seguridad de la víctima.
A solicitud de la familia, la Procuraduría General de la República retiró unidades y personal que había estado comisionado en el rancho desde el 15 de mayo, un día después del plagio, asimismo, en esa fecha, el Gobierno de Querétaro confirmó que las patrullas y oficiales de la Policía Estatal (POES) fueron retiradas esa noche (domingo), pero en el lugar estuvieron presentes día y noche oficiales de la Dirección de Seguridad Pública Municipal de Pedro Escobedo.
En los ranchos de Diego Fernández de Cevallos y Ramos, todo se encuentra normal, la gente está trabajando y no se observó nada fuera de lo cotidiano.
Ciudadanos entrevistados en la vía pública y por teléfono, en relación a la liberación del destacado político, señalaron que es una buena noticia, pues se trataba de una vida, otros indicaron que México está secuestrado por la delincuencia y que nada o poco se ha hecho por diezmarla.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: 大族激光异军突起 LED业务即将放量
description.content:
导读: 中金公司认为，大族激光经营性拐点显现，未来的高成长路径清晰。一方面大族激光厚积薄发，高端设备逐步突破，产品线逐步延伸(光伏、LED设备)；另一方面国家“十二五”战略性新兴产业规划推动了科技进步和产业升级，导致下游的需求加速。
大族激光 LED 光伏 设备
中金公司认为，大族激光[21.68 2.02%]LED封装业务今年处于整合投入期，明年有望逐步贡献利润。
近日中金公司调研了深圳市大族激光科技股份有限公司(大族激光，002008)。
中金公司认为，大族激光经营性拐点显现，未来的高成长路径清晰。一方面大族激光厚积薄发，高端设备逐步突破(大功率激光加工设备、PCB成套设备、紫外激光、绿激光等)，产品线逐步延伸(光伏、LED设备)；另一方面国家“十二五”战略性新兴产业规划推动了科技进步和产业升级，导致下游的需求加速。
中金公司认为，在政府推动“十二五”战略性新兴产业规划和产业升级的背景下，大族激光主要业务激光加工设备、PCB设备、LED封装和光伏设备均前景广阔。
由此，我们小幅上调大族激光传统业务的收入预测并纳入光伏设备的盈利贡献，我们上调大族激光2011年盈利预测41%至每股0.75元(未考虑公司可能通过出售子公司股权等方式获得的非经常性收益)。
而近期大族激光股价走强，中金公司重申对其“推荐”的投资评级，并上调12个月目标价到26.5元/股(基于2011年35倍市盈率)。
昨日大族激光逆市收涨2.02%，报收于21.68元/股。
传统业务稳健增长
中金公司认为，大族激光传统小功率激光加工设备仍将稳健增长；大功率激光加工设备已开始盈利，未来进口替代空间广阔。
作为大族激光的传统业务，之前其小功率激光打标机下游以服装、皮革等低端制造业为主。在大族激光成功进行了升级转型后，目前下游以消费电子等新兴产业为主。

description.hltext_display: Se dispara precio de Nochebuena
description.content:
El Sol de San Juan del Río
Paola Coliz
San Juan del Río, Qro.- En este año, el precio de la flor de Nochebuena incrementó su precio entre un 10 y 15 por ciento, en comparación a 2009, así lo aseguraron comerciantes de esta flor en el Municipio, quienes resaltaron que el costo alcanzaba hasta los 150 pesos, esto, de acuerdo al tamaño y al tipo de flor.
"Se tuvo un ligero incremento en el costo de la flor de Nochebuena para este año, estamos hablando de que a comparación del 2009, se tuvo un incremento de un 10 ó 15 por ciento, es decir, que su precio se elevó en unos 10 ó 20 pesos más...por lo que hablamos de que la más cara por su tamaño era de alrededor de 150 pesos", indicaron comerciantes de esta flor.
De este modo, señalaron que el incremento en el costo de la maceta de Nochebuena, se debió primordialmente a los productos de fumigación y los fertilizantes utilizados en su producción, sin embargo, insistieron en que las ventas fueron buenas ya que muchas familias tienden a comprarla para decorar sus hogares.
Y mencionaron que afortunadamente a pesar de que tuvo un ligero incremento en su precio, si hubo ventas que podrían haber llegado a un incremento de un 20 por ciento, sin embargo, resaltan que a diferencia del 2009, fue muy poco y podría decirse que sólo fue un año de recuperación.
"Tuvimos un ligero incremento en la venta de esta flor, lo que para nosotros sin duda fue más que nada una recuperación, puesto que hay que recordar que en comparación con el año pasado las ventas bajaron, hubo pérdidas en la producción debido a las heladas y pues podríamos catalogarlo como un año de recuperación, pero no de incremento", aseguraron.
Asimismo, resaltaron que entre las variedades más vendidas se encuentra la flor freedom, que tiene una coloración más intensa en sus pétalos. Este año ofrecen también variedades como festival, sub gibi; que brindan más opciones en color.
Puntualizando en que sin duda alguna, los días en los que se tuvo una mayor venta de la flor de Nochebuena fue durante la segunda semana de diciembre.
Es importante resaltar que desde el pasado mes de noviembre, en el Jardín de la Familia, en distintos comercios, mercados y tiendas comerciales se podía ver el inicio de la venta de la flor de Nochebuena.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: Durante las 8 Ferias realizadas por la Secretaría del Trabajo y el Sistema Nacional de Empleo en este año, sólo lograron colocarse a 2 mil 436 solicitantes.
description.content:
Poco el número de solicitantes en Ferias de Empleo logra colocarse. Fotos: Luis Luévanos./El Sol de San Juan del Río.
El Sol de San Juan del Río
Paola Coliz
San Juan del Río, Qro.- Durante las 8 Ferias realizadas por la Secretaría del Trabajo y el Sistema Nacional de Empleo en este año, sólo lograron colocarse a 2 mil 436 solicitantes, así lo informó el delegado federal de la STPS en el Estado, José Francisco Landeras Layseca, quien reconoció que el número es mínimo ante las más de 9 mil vacantes que se estuvieron ofertando.
"Hay que recordar que en este año, afortunadamente logramos realizar 8 Ferias del empleo, en las que a pesar de que se estuvieron ofertando más de 9 mil 500 vacantes, sólo lograron colocarse 2 mil 436 solicitantes, lo cual, sin duda alguna es muy poco, puesto que quiere decir que algo está fallando y que tenemos que poner un mayor esfuerzo para que cada vez sean más los que logren colocarse", aseguró.
Resaltando así que uno de los problemas que han podido notar y que podría ser causante de que las personas no se coloquen, es que no prestan atención a las recomendaciones que la Secretaría del Trabajo y el Servicio Nacional del Empleo les dan para que puedan conseguir el empleo.
Y dijo que uno de los puntos principales para que las personas estén a un paso de poder conseguir el empleo, tiene qué ver en la realización de su currículum, el cual, señaló cada vez debe ser más breve y conciso; al igual que la presentación y la seguridad que muestren las personas al acudir a la entrevista de trabajo.
"Tenemos que reconocer que en diversas ocasiones, la gente que acude a pedir empleo, no se coloca, porque hacen caso omiso de las recomendaciones de los cursos para el empleo que se imparten como parte de estas ferias... lo cual, provoca que encuentren obstáculos y no cuenten con lo que solicita la empresa para ingresar al campo laboral", indicó.
Asimismo, el delegado federal de la STPS, dio a conocer que sólo el 28 por ciento de los empleos que se ofrecen, son en industrias manufactureras y aeronáutica; así como también la alimenticia, refresquera y automotriz.
"Los perfiles con mayor demanda, se requiere de una preparación técnica, sobre todo en las áreas de administración, contaduría y secretariado...y quienes más se acercan a estos programas o a solicitar empleo, les puedo comentar que son los jóvenes, aunque también brindamos atención a las personas discapacitadas y adultos mayores", afirmó.
Finalmente, Landeras Layseca mencionó que al ser aprobada la Reforma Laboral reducirá la escasez de empleos, ya que mediante la contratación por hora que se propone en dicha reforma, los jóvenes y otros grupos vulnerables podrán adecuar sus horarios para conseguir un trabajo.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: Quinhagak Fifth Graders Put on Holiday Show
description.content:
Posted in Alaska Native Education, Alaska News
Josh Edge, APRN – Anchorage
With their rendition of the “Hallelujah Chorus,” Quinhagak’s Kuinerrarmiut Elitnaurviat School has joined the ranks of potential YouTube sensations.
What started out last Monday as an idea for a Christmas program for the students to perform in front of the village turned into a video, posted Monday, Dec. 20, that already touts over 450 views despite only being online for a day.
“By Wednesday, we knew we did not have enough time to prepare,” James Barthelman, a fifth grade teacher at the school, said. “So Thursday, I was kind of pacing around the room and thought, let’s just video tape it.”
“So we just sat down as a class and brainstormed a bunch of ideas.”
After the brainstorming session, where the class determined how they wanted the video to look and some of the places where they should record, they settled on a creatively edited, card flipping version of the chorus.
Though organizing that many cards and people, the group, Barthelman included, proved it was up to the challenge of creating and organizing the cards that are used throughout the video.
“I had to stand there and sing the songs, I don’t know how many times,” Barthelman said, describing how the class was able to time the flipping of the cards to the song.
For three long days, the class filmed hours of video, turning in around 100 individual clips to be edited.
Friday, they recorded about three hours of footage. Then Saturday, after more than five hours of filming, 70 different videos were turned in. The last day of filming on Sunday took them to the church, giving more of the community a chance to get involved.
Once all of the footage was turned in on Sunday, it was up to Barthelman to edit it together.
“It was kind of a last-minute idea, but it came out pretty well,” Barthelman said. “We’re pretty proud of it.”
The video was shown to the village of around 550 people on Monday night. Quinhagak is a Yupik village on the Bering Sea coast in Southwest Alaska, south of Bethel.
This is brilliant!! Way to go, Quinhagak!
Quinhagak Rocks!
We love it! Great job!!
Awesome, cool, inspiring!!! King of Kings, Lord of Lords!
Quinhagak Fan
Way to put yourselves on the map, Quinhagak!
Absolutely wonderful and inspiring!!!!
It's going viral and that's a good thing. Very creative, very charming. Thank you James.
Yet another great teacher giving and giving.
Awesome!!! I predict you will get a lot more views :) Great Job!

event_or_fact.property: describing how the class was able to time the flipping of the cards to the song

description.hltext_display: VS biedt Iran hulp en kondigt ook sancties af
Fallan Ferias del empleo
description.content:
Poco el número de solicitantes en Ferias de Empleo logra colocarse. Fotos: Luis Luévanos./El Sol de San Juan del Río.
El Sol de San Juan del Río
22 de diciembre de 2010
Poco el número de solicitantes en Ferias de Empleo logra colocarse. Fotos: Luis Luévanos./El Sol de San Juan del Río.

description.hltext_display: Mye skal på plass
description.content:
Adresseavisen ønsker en åpen og saklig debatt. Vi forbeholder oss retten til å forkorte, redigere og eventuelt fjerne innlegg.
Regler for debatt her på adressa.no:
Alle innlegg må signeres med fullt navn og epostadresse.
Diskuter sak, ikke person. Det er ikke tillatt å trakassere meddebattanter.
Banning er ikke tillatt.
Hold deg unna rasisme og personangrep.
Adresseavisen har redaktøraransvar for alt som publiseres, men du er også personlig ansvarlig for innholdet i innlegget.
Innlegg må skrives på norsk, svensk, dansk eller engelsk.
Skriv kort fordi korte innlegg blir mest lest.
Publisering av opphavsrettsbeskyttet materiale er ikke tillatt. Du kan sitere korte utdrag av andre tekster eller artikler, men husk kildehenvisning.
Det er ikke tillatt å legge inn lenker i teksten
Alle innlegg blir kontrollert før de publiseres på adressa.no.
Innlegg blir slettet eller redigert dersom de bryter med våre grunnregler. Vi forbeholder oss retten til å stenge ute debattanter som ikke overholder reglene.

description.hltext_display: No response : Vehicle Damage claim
description.content: During jUNE 2010 i took out bodyline maintenance cover from Unitrans for which I have paid premiums from June 2010 to present.I submitted a claim durin the beginning of December 2010. According to policy document their turn around time to handle the claim is 3 working days. More than 20 days have elapsed and not feedback given concerning the status of claim. According to Smart insurance the policy is non - existent. I submitted proof of payment ( monthly debit order)as well as policy document from Unitrans, however, they still have not responded.How unprofessional can staff of Smart Insurance be as I clearly have proof of insurance & payment whereas their system does not regard me as a contributory member.

Endret: 22.12.2010 kl. 08:53
Virksomhetene som selges, har ingen ansatte i Norge, opplyser selskapet.
Salget gjennomføres for at Aker Solutions skal konsentrere seg om leveranser til olje- og gassindustrien.
– Aker Solutions kunngjorde i august beslutningen om å skille ut P&C-forretningsområdet fra resten av Aker Solutions. Siden da har vi vurdert alternative separasjonsmetoder, inkludert en børsnotering. Etter hvert som de ulike alternativene modnet, fremsto et salg til Jacobs som den beste løsningen både industrielt og finansielt, sier arbeidende styreformann Øyvind Eriksen i Aker Solutions.
– Fremtidens Aker Solutions vil være en rendyrket leverandør av ingeniørtjenester, teknologier, løsninger og servicetjenester for leting og utvinning av olje og gass, legger han. (©NTB)

Diskuter sak, ikke person. Det er ikke tillatt å trakassere meddebattanter.
Banning er ikke tillatt.
Hold deg unna rasisme og personangrep.

description.hltext_display: 2010 A good year for concerts
description.author: Mihai Barbu

description.hltext_display: OUR OPINION: Growth at last, growth at last
description.content:
“New census shows 4.7 percent N.D. population increase, just shy of all-time record,” the headline read. And with that, North Dakota’s major concern for most of the 20th and early 21st century receded in the rear-view mirror.
For generations, the overarching challenge facing North Dakota has been growth.
Not crime, which is the major problem in many other states. Growth.
Not K-12 education, which is the major problem in many of the rest of the states. Growth.
That’s why Tuesday’s U.S. Census findings qualify as one of the best-news stories in years. Maybe decades.
“New census shows 4.7 percent N.D. population increase, just shy of all-time record,” the headline read.
And with that, North Dakota’s major concern for most of the 20th and early 21st century receded in the rear-view mirror.
It has been years since anyone in North Dakota truly fretted about the Buffalo Commons, the Too-Much-Mistake or any of the other terms given to the Great Emptying Out. Now we’ve confirmed why, because some good share of what had been emptying is filling back in.
No, the threat of depopulation certainly hasn’t vanished; and who can fully predict what the future will bring? A collapse in oil prices or some other Bakken bust could bring at least one big engine of the state’s growth to a sputtering halt.
But that threat is so much more remote today, in part because the other sectors of North Dakota’s economy have improved, too.
And you don’t have to be a historian to know about the way things were. Remember those days not so very long ago, when business and political leaders toyed with dropping the “North” in the state’s name? When economists argued that the state should focus its resources on the six or seven biggest cities because the rest of the state was toast?
When the Greater North Dakota Association — at the time, the state’s Chamber of Commerce — began its 1990 report on the state’s economy with these words:
“Last October, the North Dakota 2000 Committee went out and asked if North Dakota was dying. The people of North Dakota said yes, it would, unless we change the way we look at things.”
Speaking of the association’s Vision 2000 report, some of its findings are worth remembering today, as North Dakota approaches the population figure that it last reached 80 years ago:
“North Dakota was the only state in the U.S. to have fewer residents in 1990 than it did in 1930,” a Vision 2000 summary reads.
“Per capita income had steadily declined since 1975 and was 15 percent below the national average in 1990.
“Young people were leaving the state. In the three years leading up to the report, 17,000 people between the ages of 22 to 25 had left North Dakota.”
And so on.
Minnesota got great news from the census, too; more about that in a future editorial. For now, let’s just bask in the glow of these upbeat figures and enjoy the unfamiliar (in North Dakota, at least) thrill of being a center of growth.
— Tom Dennis for the Herald
Tags: census 2010, 2010 census, opinion, editorials, population, growth, census

description.hltext_display: Ensworth boys rally to winThe Ensworth boys advanced to the championship game of their own Holiday Shootout.
description.content:
The Ensworth boys scored the first 10 points of the fourth quarter Tuesday to beat Brentwood 61-52 and advance to the championship game of the Ensworth Holiday Shootout. Ensworth (7-1) will play Livingston Academy, an 81-77 winner over CPA in overtime, at 8 tonight for the championship.
The Tigers led 27-20 at the half, but Brentwood's James Cox scored the first eight points of the third quarter to spark an 11-0 run by the Bruins (10-3).
The Bruins led by their largest margin at 41-35 after a Cox jumper with 2:05 left in the third quarter. Then Ensworth started taking control.
David Dingess' putback at the third-quarter buzzer cut the Brentwood lead to
41-40.
"That was huge for us," said Dingess, who led Ensworth with 17 points. "We went on a good run there."
Jack Montague led Brentwood with 15 points. Cox finished with 14.
Brentwood Coach Dennis King said he did find some encouragement from the way his team started the third quarter.
"We'd had four consecutive unbelievably bad third quarters in the last few games," King said.
"We were concentrating and tried to get out early and we did. They played good defense and kept putting in fresh guys, and it just got to us."
Livingston Acad. 81, CPA 77 (OT): Mason Ramsey scored 25 points as Livingston Academy (7-6) won in overtime in the other semifinal.
Craig Bradshaw scored 25 points for CPA (9-3).
GIRLS
Livingston Acad. 45, Ensworth 35: Tori Stocking made four 3-pointers in the final five minutes of the half and finished with 16 points for Livingston Academy
(13-1).
The Lady Wildcats will play Clarksville tonight at 6:30 in the title game.
The Lady Tigers (7-3) started the game on an 8-0 run.
"It's about runs," Stocking said. "We had to make runs. They packed it inside and we were able to kick it out and find open shooters."
Justice Swett scored 12 points to lead Ensworth.
Clarksville 58, CPA 45: Jessy Ward scored 19 points to lead Clarksville (11-2). Meredith Roman scored 18 points for CPA (9-3).

description.hltext_display: PSV in bekertoernooi tegen Roda JC
great service-thank you!!!!
description.content: While driving, my car suddenly started billowing white smoke out the air vents. I immediatly stopped and my car was leaking fluid and making a horrible noise. I phoned Miway, and Nathan answered. I was very distressed and he was so understanding it immediatly calmed me down. He was very concerned about my safety and once I assured him that I had someone on their way to be with me, he sorted out the towing of my vehicle to the nearest accredited dealer. He phoned back 4 times to ensure all was ok and that the towing service had arrived. His kindness and excellent service made a very unpleasant situation much more manageable and I am so greatful. I only recently switched my car insurance to Miway and am so glad I did. Thank you Nathan and Miway!!!

description.hltext_display: 氧� 感器的常见故障及检查方法
description.content:
在使用三元催化转换器以减少排气污染的发动机上，氧传感器是必不可少的元件。由于混合气的空燃比一旦偏离理论空燃比，三元催化剂对CO、HC和NOX的净化能力将急剧下降，故在排气管中安装氧传感器，用以检测排气中氧的浓度，并向ECU发出反馈信号，再由ECU控制喷油器喷油量的增减，从而将混合气的空燃比控制在理论值附近。
目前，实际应用的氧传感器有氧化锆式氧传感器和氧化钛式氧传感器两种。而常见的氧传感器又有单引线、双引线和三根引线之分，；单引线的为氧化锆式氧传感器；双引线的为氧化钛式氧传感器；三根引线的为加热型氧化锆式氧传感器，原则上三种引线方式的氧传感器是不能替代使用的。
氧传感器一旦出现故障，将使电子燃油喷射系统的电脑不能得到排气管中氧浓度的信息，因而不能对空燃比进行反馈控制，会使发动机油耗和排气污染增加，发动机出现怠速不稳、缺火、喘振等故障现象。因此，必须及时地排除故障或更换。
氧传感器中毒是经常出现的且较难防治的一种故障，尤其是经常使用含铅汽油的汽车，即使是新的氧传感器，也只能工作几千公里。如果只是轻微的铅中毒，接着使用一箱不含铅的汽油，就能消除氧传感器表面的铅，使其恢复正常工作。但往往由于过高的排气温度，而使铅侵入其内部，阻碍了氧离子的扩散，使氧传感器失效，这时就只能更换了。
另外，氧传感器发生硅中毒也是常有的事。一般来说，汽油和润滑油中含有的硅化合物燃烧后生成的二氧化硅，硅橡胶密封垫圈使用不当散发出的有机硅气体，都会使氧传感器失效，因而要使用质量好的燃油和润滑油。修理时要正确选用和安装橡胶垫圈，不要在传感器上涂敷制造厂规定使用以外的溶剂和防粘剂等。
2.积碳
由于发动机燃烧不好，在氧传感器表面形成积碳，或氧传感器内部进入了油污或尘埃等沉积物，会阻碍或阻塞外部空气进入氧传感器内部，使氧传感器输出的信号失准，ECU不能及时地修正空燃比。产生积碳，主要表现为油耗上升，排放浓度明显增加。此时，若将沉积物清除，就会恢复正常工作。
3.氧传感器陶瓷碎裂
氧传感器的陶瓷硬而脆，用硬物敲击或用强烈气流吹洗，都可能使其碎裂而失效。因此，处理时要特别小心，发现问题及时更换。
4.加热器电阻丝烧断
对于加热型氧传感器，如果加热器电阻丝烧蚀，就很难使传感器达到正常的工作温度而失去作用。
5.氧传感器内部线路断脱。
二、氧传感器的检查方法
1.氧传感器加热器电阻的检查
拔下氧传感器线束插头，用万用表电阻档测量氧传感器接线端中加热器接柱与搭铁接柱之间的电阻，其阻值为4-40Ω(参考具体车型说明书)。如不符合标准，应更换氧传感器。
2.氧传感器反馈电压的测量
测量氧传感器的反馈电压时，应拔下氧传感器的线束插头，对照车型的电路图，从氧传感器的反馈电压输出接线柱上引出一条细导线，然后插好线束插头，在发动机运转中，从引出线上测出反馈电压(有些车型也可以由故障检测插座内测得氧传感器的反馈电压，如丰田汽车公司生产的系列轿车都可以从故障检测插座内的OX1或OX2端子内直接测得氧传感器的反馈电压)。
对氧传感器的反馈电压进行检测时，最好使用具有低量程(通常为2V)和高阻抗(内阻大于10MΩ)的指针型万用表。具体的检测方法如下：
1)将发动机热车至正常工作温度(或起动后以2500r/min的转速运转2min)；
2)将万用表电压档的负表笔接故障检测插座内的E1或蓄电池负极，正表笔接故障检测插座内的OX1或OX2插孔，或接氧传感器线束插头上的号|出线；
3)让发动机以2500r/min左右的转速保持运转，同时检查电压表指针能否在0-1V之间来回摆动，记下10s内电压表指针摆动的次数。在正常情况下，随着反馈控制的进行，氧传感器的反馈电压将在0.45V上下不断变化，10s内反馈电压的变化次数应不少于8次。如果少于8次，则说明氧传感器或反馈控制系统工作不正常，其原因可能是氧传感器表面有积碳，使灵敏度降低所致。对此，应让发动机以2500r/min的转速运转约2min，以清除氧传感器表面的积碳，然后再检查反馈电压。如果在清除积碳可后电压表指针变化依旧缓慢，则说明氧传感器损坏，或电脑反馈控制电路有故障。
4)检查氧传感器有无损坏
拔下氧传感器的线束插头，使氧传感器不再与电脑连接，反馈控制系统处于开环控制状态。将万用表电压档的正表笔直接与氧传感器反馈电压输出接线柱连接，负表笔良好搭铁。在发动机运转中测量反馈电压，先脱开接在进气管上的曲轴箱强制通风管或其他真空软管，人为地形成稀混合气，同时观看电压表，其指针读数应下降。然后接上脱开的管路，再拔下水温传感器接头，用一个4-8KΩ的电阻代替水温传感器，人为地形成浓混合气，同时观看电压表，其指针读数应上升。也可以用突然踩下或松开加速踏板的方法来改变混合气的浓度，在突然踩下加速踏板时，混合气变浓，反馈电压应上升；突然松开加速踏板时，混合气变稀，反馈电压应下降。如果氧传感器的反馈电压无上述变化，表明氧传感器已损坏。
另外，氧化钛式氧传感器在采用上述方法检测时，若是良好的氧传感器，输出端的电压应以2.5V为中心上下波动。否则可拆下传感器并暴露在空气中，冷却后测量其电阻值。若电阻值很大，说明传感器是好的，否则应更换传感器。
5)氧传感器外观颜色的检查
从排气管上拆下氧传感器，检查传感器外壳上的通气孔有无堵塞，陶瓷芯有无破损。如有破损，则应更换氧传感器。
通过观察氧传感器顶尖部位的颜色也可以判断故障：
①淡灰色顶尖：这是氧传感器的正常颜色；
②白色顶尖：由硅污染造成的，此时必须更换氧传感器；
③棕色顶尖：由铅污染造成的，如果严重，也必须更换氧传感器；
④黑色顶尖：由积碳造成的，在排除发动机积碳故障后，一般可以自动清除氧传感器上的积碳。

description.hltext_display: Unfair redundancy cuts face legal challenge from union
description.author: Claire West
description.content: The union, which successfully defeated in the High Court the previous government's attempts to slash the terms available to civil servants, believes it has a strong case on human rights grounds. This position received a boost last month when an influential parliamentary committee suggested an interim measure to cap payments could be in breach of the European Convention on Human Rights. The human rights joint committee said the government had failed to make the case for imposing cuts to the civil service redundancy scheme, which governs the terms available to civil servants who are made redundant either compulsorily or by agreement. The union argues that because civil servants have accrued a right to certain redundancy terms through their length of service, this is classed as a "possession" under human rights legislation, and should not be "interfered with" unless there is an over-riding public interest. The previous government's attempt to impose a new redundancy scheme was struck down by the High Court earlier this year following a successful judicial review taken by the union. PCS, by far the largest civil service union, is currently consulting its members in a ballot and is recommending a rejection of the government's changes because they fail to protect the lowest paid. PCS general secretary Mark Serwotka said: "This should be seen in the context of the government's politically-motivated cuts to public spending and represents a shameful and cynical attempt to make it easier and cheaper to sack its own workforce."We have always said we are prepared to negotiate to agree a new scheme and we are determined that these unfair cuts will not be imposed on our members. We have successfully defended our members' rights in court and believe we have a very strong case to do so again."

event_or_fact.property: This should be seen in the context of the government's politically-motivated cuts to public spending and represents a shameful and cynical attempt to make it easier and cheaper to sack its own workforce.

description.hltext_display: Tips for peace on earth while visiting the in-laws
description.content:
11Whether or not that statement rings true for you, there is a reason many modern holiday movies feature at least one dysfunctional family gathering. Too much togetherness during the holidays can strain even the best of family relationships. Time spent with in-laws is no exception -- in fact, dealing with in-laws during the holidays may be extra challenging because every family does things differently.
For tips on how to deal with your spouse's family, the Daily Herald interviewed Dean Busby, a professor in the School of Family Life at Brigham Young University. Busby has a doctorate degree in marriage and family therapy. He is one of the principal investigators for the Relate Institute at BYU, which operates an online study couples can take to assess their premarital or marital relationship.
Here are his seven tips:
1 Mother-in-laws matter: One of the most important in-laws to get along with is a wife's mother, Busby says. Numerous studies have shown that married women have stronger connections with their support systems than their husbands do. "My advice to engaged men is to get to know their mother-in-law and get in her good graces and that will help their relationship," Busby said.
2Set time limits: Busby recommends setting limits on the amount of time spent at the in-laws' house. "I have a one-week rule," Busby said."You don't stay in any one place longer than a week because that is when you start to get on each other's nerves." He also recommends breaking up a weeklong trip with excursions to visit other family in the area. "That lets the people whose house you're staying in get a break," Busby said. "Otherwise, tension just sort of builds up and then our patience grows thin. People tend to get a little more on edge and end up saying things they wouldn't have said if they had just taken a little time apart."
3 Get out of the house: For those who have a hard time being in their in-laws' house for even a few days, Busby recommends planning daily outings. "First, don't spend more than a day or two there if you can," Busby said. "When you're there, go out and play in the snow. Take the kids to the mall. Let grandpa take them to the movies or do something else."
4 Do no harm: As magical as it would be to completely repair a broken relationship during the magical holiday times, it's likely not going to happen. "If it's just a holiday visit and you don't spend a lot of time with them regularly, it's not a good time to make big relationship changes," Busby said. "If you're only going to be visiting once every six months, it's hard to make a difference and sustain that into the next time you're going to be together." Instead, focus on doing no harm. "Do what you can to make the experience as pleasant as possible," he said. "You have to look at your interaction with their parents as a gift you're giving to your spouse."
5 Pass the buck: Usually, family loyalties are tied to the immediate family member in the relationship. So if there is a difficulty or challenge with an in-law, the spouse from that family should be the one that initiates the conversation and tries to iron things out. "Sometimes the non-biological person wants to get into it to 'help,' but they usually don't because there are stronger loyalties to the natural child," Busby said. "Let the non-biological spouse do things that are more enjoyable and fun rather than having to deal with some of these other issues."
6 Zip your lips: One of the biggest mistakes couples make is sharing marital conflict with their parents. "That is a big no-no," Busby said. "It just does not help at all. You keep that struggle between you and your spouse." Telling all to a parent puts them in an impossible situation, he said. The parent(s) will feel more loyal to their child and will be upset with the spouse longer than the child will. At holiday gatherings, parents may remember these situations and have a hard time being friendly with a spouse. Likewise, if a parent tries to talk to you about their marital strife, change the subject or ask to remain uninvolved, he advised.
7 Don't fight it: If someone in the family is extremely confrontational, avoid that person as much as possible, Busby said. Don't respond to rude remarks and try to find something positive in their comments. "It can be painful for a short period of time but it's not going to do any good to fight, either," Busby said. "If you refuse to fight with people that are easy to fight with, they'll get the message and stop trying to throw out as much bait. Just think of this as a time to do some extra giving."

description.hltext_display: Kjører fra Arendal til Ås for å synge i kor
description.content: ivrig korsanger: Janne Saberniak er mer enn en alminnelig ivrig korsanger. Hun kjører gladelig Arendal-Ås og retur hver uke for å delta i korøvelsene til ÅsEnsemblet. I morgen kveld står hun i koret for å formidle julestemning i Ås kirke. FOTO: AMUND LÅGBU

description.hltext_display: Lille julaften er bulkedagen i Trøndelag
description.author: CAMILLA KILNES
description.content:
Dersom du ser fedre med diamanter i blikket så bør du skygge unna. Den store bulkedagen er i morgen. Foto: BJARNE VESTMO
I resten av landet er den store bulkedagen i dag. Trøndere derimot, er litt tregere.
Du er herved advart. Den store bulkedagen i fjor var 22. desember på landsbasis. Men trøndere fornekter seg ikke, og er sedvanlig trege.
- Det var lille julaften, 23. desember, som ble den store bulkedagen i Trøndelag i fjor. Da inntraff 58 ryggeuhell og påkjøring av parkerte biler i Trøndelag, sier Stine Neverdal, kommunikasjonsrådgiver i Finansnæringens fellesorganisasjon (FNO).
«Træge trøndere»
Siden julaften kommer på en fredag, og de fleste er i arbeid helt frem til høytidsdagen, tror også informasjonssjef Jon Berge i If skadeforsikring. at den store bulkedagen for hele landet blir 23. desember.
- Folk utsetter det meste til siste liten. Siden trøndere er trege, så skal du ikke se bort ifra at det blir julaften som blir den store bulkedagen i den regionen, sier han leende.
LES MER: Disse hjelper deg med å parkere i julestria
Trondheim og Stjørdal utpekte seg med henholdsvis 26 og 13 registrerte bulkeuhell på lille julaften i fjor.
Verstingene mellom 35-49
Uhellene skjer gjerne på overfylte parkeringsplasser eller trange parkeringshus.
- Dette er irriterende småskader som man kan unngå. Stress ned og konsentrer deg om kjøringen, råder Neverdal.
Bulkeverstingene er folk i aldersgruppen 35 til 49 år.
Flere saker i år
Hos If skadeforsikring frykter man at kulde og vanskelige kjøreforhold skal gjøre juleinnspurten til et langt bulkemareritt.
- Vi ser allerede en økning i antall innmeldte saker i år sammenlignet med i fjor. Kurven peker bratt oppover dess lenger ut i desember man kommer, sier Berge.
Ferske tall fra trøndelagsfylkene fra If skadeforsikring viser at trønderne har vært uforsiktige. Fra 1. desember til og med 18. desember ble det registrert 21 påkjørsler av parkert kjøretøy og 18 rygginger på annet kjøretøy i Nord- og Sør-Trøndelag.
Skygg unna stressede fedre
Det finnes noen enkle forholdsregler som du kan ta dersom du ønsker å unngå sure ekstrakostnader.
- Vær oppmerksom på familiefedre som har diamanter til sin kone i sikte på lille julaften eller julaften. Skygg unna, råder Berge.
På 23. desember i fjor mottok forsikringsselskapene skademeldinger som tilsvarte én hendelse hvert minutt mellom klokka seks om morgenen og midnatt.
Rådyr julehandel
Forsikringsselskapene måtte ut med 55 millioner kroner på grunn av bulkeskader den siste uka før jul i fjor. Det er ingen grunn til å tro at det blir noe mindre i år.
- Smeller man opp døra, så kan skadene fort bli 7000 kroner på hver bil, sier Berge.
Legg igjen kontaktinfo
Vanligvis ligger utbetalingene på om lag 33 millioner kroner. Det betyr en økning på 67 prosent i uka før jul.
Og skulle uhellet være ute, så legg igjen kontaktinformasjon. Spør folk i nærheten om de har sett noe, og se etter kamera som kan ha filmet hendelsen.
Skriv din kommentar
Fornavn *
Etternavn *
e-post *
Kallenavn (valgfritt)

Adresseavisen ønsker en åpen og saklig debatt. Vi forbeholder oss retten til å forkorte, redigere og eventuelt fjerne innlegg.
Regler for debatt her på adressa.no:
Alle innlegg må signeres med fullt navn og epostadresse.
Diskuter sak, ikke person. Det er ikke tillatt å trakassere meddebattanter.
Banning er ikke tillatt.
Hold deg unna rasisme og personangrep.
Adresseavisen har redaktøraransvar for alt som publiseres, men du er også personlig ansvarlig for innholdet i innlegget.
Innlegg må skrives på norsk, svensk, dansk eller engelsk.
Skriv kort fordi korte innlegg blir mest lest.
Publisering av opphavsrettsbeskyttet materiale er ikke tillatt. Du kan sitere korte utdrag av andre tekster eller artikler, men husk kildehenvisning.
Det er ikke tillatt å legge inn lenker i teksten
Alle innlegg blir kontrollert før de publiseres på adressa.no.
Innlegg blir slettet eller redigert dersom de bryter med våre grunnregler. Vi forbeholder oss retten til å stenge ute debattanter som ikke overholder reglene.

description.hltext_display: [사설] 국제공항에서 조폭 택시영업이라니
description.content:
인천국제공항과 김포국제공항을 장악하고 폭력과 불법을 일삼아온 일당이 검거됐다. 서울지방경찰청은 김포공항에서 택시영업 독점조직을 만들고 폭력을 휘두른 혐의로 7명을 구속하고 11명을 불구속 입건했다고 그제 밝혔다. 이에 앞서 지난 13일에는 인천공항의 불법 콜밴 영업조직 28명이 인천경찰청에 붙잡혔다.
이들 공항 폭력조직의 행태는 가관이다. 인천공항에서는 호객 영역을 멋대로 나누어 관리하며 다른 기사의 영업을 방해하고, 심지어 단속원 폭행도 서슴지 않았다. 한 파키스탄인을 서울 서초동 호텔까지 태워주고는 800달러(약 100만원)의 바가지를 씌우기도 했다니 기가 막히지 않을 수 없다. 김포공항을 장악한 소위 ‘N공항파’는 외부 택시가 들어오면 유리창을 깨는 등 폭행을 가하고 ‘조직을 배신한 자는 끝까지 보복한다’ 등 행동강령까지 만들어 운영했다.
시골 버스터미널도 아닌 국제공항에서 어떻게 이런 일이 벌어지고 있는지 이해가 안 된다. 인천공항에서는 개항초인 2001년부터 이런 일이 있어 왔고, 그동안 몇 차례 단속과 처벌이 있었지만 근절되지 않았다고 한다. 이것이 우리 경찰의 한계라면 속 터지는 얘기다. 공항공사는 눈과 귀를 틀어막고 있는 것인지 모르겠다.
국제공항은 나라의 관문이다. 우리나라를 찾는 외국인들은 인천공항과 김포공항에서 처음으로 한국을 느낀다. 그리고 첫인상은 깊이 각인된다. 정부가 그렇게 국격을 외치면서 왜 이런 일을 방치해 왔는지 알 수 없다. G20을 자임하는 국가에서 도저히 있을 수 없는 일이다. 다시는 이런 불법이 자리하지 못하도록 해야 한다.

description.hltext_display: Waiting almost t a year for a cellphone repair
description.content: My phone had water damage and I put a claim through Finrite to repair it. The claim was placed on 29Mar10. They advised me to pay the excess and the phone will be collected. This was paid but the phone was never collected. I was forced to get another cellphone instead. On the 1 Sept10 the secretary told me that she still has the phone with her. When I contacted the consultant that assisted me I was told that she is on maternity but her manager will assist me. He then asked me to send a copy of my id hence the claim cannot be processed. My thinking was that they should have a copy on file, but I complied. No one came back to me to let me know have far the claim was. On the 30Nov10 I followed up on the email that I sent to another consultant as still no phone was collected but no response. On I escalated by phoning the call centre to speak to a manager. With alot of to an frowing it was told that this will be resolved and will get a new phone instead for the inconvience on the 10Dec, it is now the 21Dec0 and I still do not have the phone in my possession. I've been a customer for years and I have to wait 9months and make endless phone calls to get my claim resolved. It's appalling!!

description.hltext_display: Bonnie Cameron, Grand Forks, letter -- Dear Bonnie: Yep, Marilyn’s tops. Signed, Santa
description.content:
So, Santa, could you fill Marilyn Hagerty’s stocking with words of gratitude from our community for all the remembering she does of activities and people? And please give her quick clearance and safe travel at all airports as she flies around the world. We want her back with us in Grand Forks.
GRAND FORKS — Dear Santa:
On Sunday, Herald columnist Marilyn Hagerty wrote in her column she hadn’t been too good this year. We disagree!
Santa, I am sure you know that it takes a caring and sharing heart to simply ask for things for others. Marilyn always is profiling issues, concerns or people who make a difference in our ever-changing world.
Many groups would be hurting to get the word out about their activities if it weren’t for Marilyn’s dedicated efforts to profile them in her column.
She is a great example — especially for us older folks — as we see her walking or bicycling three seasons of the year, reminding us of the value of exercise for our body and mind.
She speaks from the heart to help us understand and face some of the tough parts of life. She is pretty amazing, Santa.
So, Santa, could you fill Marilyn’s stocking with words of gratitude from our community for all the remembering she does of activities and people? And please give her quick clearance and safe travel at all airports as she flies around the world. We want her back with us in Grand Forks.
During this year, wrap Marilyn and her family in love and support as they meet life.
Also, Santa: It would be nice to name Marilyn Hagerty “Cheerful Person of the Week.” She does bring smiles and laughter to many.
Signed, appreciative Grand Forks elves.
Bonnie Cameron
Tags: in the mail, marilyn hagerty, that reminds me, cheerful person, opinion, column

event_or_fact.property: in her column she hadn?t been too good this year

description.hltext_display: Madelyn Hutson is The Tennessean volleyball player of the year after leading Ravenwood to the Class AAA championship.">All-Midstate volleyballRavenwood's Madelyn Hutson is today named The Tennessean volleyball player of the year after leading her team to
description.content:
PLAYER OF THE YEAR: MADELYN HUTSON RAVENWOOD | SENIOR | 6-F00T-5 | OUTSIDE HITTER
Why chosen. Hutson led Ravenwood (49-8) to the Class AAA title, averaging four kills per game with a total of 587 for the season. She also had 76 aces and 150 blocks. Hutson was named a first-team Under Armour All-American, the Gatorade state player of the year, state tournament MVP and District 11-AAA MVP. She also was The Tennessean player of the year in 2009.
College plans. She has signed with Texas, where she will enroll for the spring semester.
RelatedAll-Midstate volleyball
Quote. "Winning state was always our goal. It's what we worked for the whole season, definitely just kind of avenging that loss (to Dobyns-Bennett in the final) last year."
Family. Parents Jane and John, sister Kathryn, 14; yellow Labrador retriever Luke, cats Smokey, The Kitten.
What's on your iPod? "Paramore, Lil Wayne, Lady Gaga, Nicki Minaj."
Best high school sports moment. "Definitely winning state this year. It was wonderful, just a great sense of accomplishment. Especially being able to end on a bang for me and my high school career overall. It was picture perfect."
Favorite athlete. "Troy Polamalu. He's so my favorite and will always be my favorite. He is amazing. I actually got to meet him this year. It was at the Titans game when (Pittsburgh) played the Titans here. He's really soft-spoken and one of the nicest people I've met. I was speechless. My dad is an athletic trainer for the Titans. I really respect Troy as an athlete and a player."
Best video game. "I'm not so much into video games."
Is this your best sport? "Yeah, I think so. I used to play basketball, but my heart is in volleyball. It's definitely what I want to do. I started track in high jump this past season, but I (injured) my foot and had to stop. It was still bugging me at the beginning of school volleyball season, but it's good now."
Best Christmas gift you could get. "I just got my new MacBook for college, and I've had a lot of fun with that. It's what most of the girls at Texas have. It's a pretty typical college student computer." (2 of 2)FIRST TEAM
BROOKE FAULKNER Siegel, Senior, 5-8
Outside Hitter
Why chosen. Faulkner led Siegel (51-9) to a third-place finish in Class AAA as she posted 538 kills, 407 digs, 53 aces and 42 blocks.
RelatedAll-Midstate volleyball
MOLLY LOCKE
Page, Junior, 5-10
Outside Hitter
Why chosen. The Class AA MVP led Page (47-13) to its fifth state title as she posted 437 kills, 265 digs and 113 aces.
CAROLINE CARLTON
Independence, Senior, 5-10
Middle Hitter
Why chosen. The Mercer commitment led Independence (41-20) to a fourth-place Class AAA finish with 625 kills, 74 blocks and 68 block assists.
MACKINNON MORRISSEY
Ensworth, Senior, 5-4
Libero
Why chosen. Morrissey led Ensworth (36-8) to its first Division II-AA championship as a defensive anchor who averaged 20 digs per game.
ALYSSA IVEY
Ravenwood, Junior, 5-8
Setter
Why chosen. The Region 6-AAA MVP had a .980 serving percentage, 59 aces, 604 assists and 197 kills.
TAYLER MCGUIRE
Page, Senior, 5-6
Setter
Why chosen. The District 12-AA MVP had 1,300 assists, 144 digs and 137 aces.
SECOND TEAM
OH Emily VanGrinsven, Brentwood, Sr.
OH Cody Dodd, Cookeville, Jr.
OH Sarah Fulner, Goodpasture, Sr.
MH Lauren Kaufman, Brentwood, Sr.
L Brianna McCombs, Independence, Jr.
S Lydia Wright, Ravenwood, Sr.
S Becca Cutter, Siegel, Jr.
THIRD TEAM
OH Chelsea Ross, Riverdale, Jr.
OH Kaitlyn Teeter, Friendship, So.
OH ReJean Rouse, Ensworth, Jr.
MH Shannon Carr, Father Ryan, Sr.
L Kennetha Wallace, Hillwood, Sr.
S Cheyanne Kyle, Columbia, Sr.
S Rachel Smith, Ensworth, Sr.
COACH OF THE YEAR: EVA LEA, ENSWORTH
Why chosen. She led Ensworth (36-8) to its first Division II-AA championship with a 17-25, 20-25, 26-24, 25-17, 15-9 win over St. Benedict. Ensworth, a sixth-year varsity program, rallied from 2-0 deficits to win all three of its state tournament matches. The Lady Tigers rebuilt quickly after graduating four seniors and losing two transfers from the 2009 team.
Quote. " 'Resilient' comes to mind. I did think that from early in the season. I just knew that we had a very unique dynamic that I hadn't seen in high school female athletes. Volleyball is a game of momentum, for sure. We sort of had this unspoken philosophy of just keep playing. They never got too high or too low and were able to keep playing through the rough spots."
RECENT PLAYERS OF THE YEAR
2009. Madelyn Hutson, Ravenwood
2008. Nicole Smith, Page
2007. Becca Brewster, Brentwood
2006. Katherine Hall, Brentwood, and Emily Teegarden, Father Ryan
2005. Taylor Parrish, Harpeth Hall

Murkowski Voting Yes on START Treaty
Libby Casey, APRN – Washington DC
Senator Lisa Murkowski committed today to vote for START, the Strategic Arms Reduction Treaty. The new START over nuclear arms with Russia is one of President Obama’s top priorities for the waning session of Congress, and on Tuesday enough Republicans signaled they will vote “yea” to reach the needed two-thirds vote of the Senate.
START May Affect Fort Greely
Tim Ellis, KUAC – Fairbanks
Delta Junction city officials say they don’t believe the New START treaty will threaten the missile interceptor base at Fort Greely. Others aren’t so sure.
Flags Lowered for Former Legislator’s Passing
Rosemarie Alexander, KTOO – Juneau
Former legislator, commissioner, and lobbyist “Wally” (Walter) Kubley has died at the age of 89. Governor Sean Parnell ordered state flags lowered Tuesday in Kubley’s memory.
Kubley served in the Alaska State House of Representatives during the Second and Third Legislatures. He was a senior advisor and legislative liaison to Governor Wally Hickel, and was commerce commissioner under Governor Keith Miller.
He also was a long-time lobbyist in the state capitol working on Southeast issues. In later years, his son Don Kubley lobbied with him. He says the Ketchikan shipyard is one of the highlights.
When Kubley served in the legislature, not long after statehood, he helped write the 1963 legislation that established the state division of Marine Transportation and the Alaska Marine Highway System.
Wally Kubley served in the U.S. Coast Guard during World War Two. When he returned to Ketchikan, he built the now famous Sourdough Bar as well as Ketchikan’s first bowling alley. Other businesses include The Sportsman Bar and Restaurant in Wards Cove, and Model Laundry and Dry Cleaners.
He was elected to the Ketchikan City Council, and was a long-time member of the Ketchikan Volunteer Fire Department.
He’s survived by two sons and a daughter, and six grandchildren. Any memorials should go to the Ketchikan or Juneau Little League Associations.
Missing Snowmachiner Found by Search Team
Shane Iverson, KYUK – Bethel
A snowmachiner missing for three days was found by Search teams late Monday afternoon. The traveler had just a little food. But an extensive search between the Yukon and Kuskokwim Rivers came through for him in time.
2010 Census Shows Growth in Alaska
Lori Townsend, APRN – Anchorage
The US Census Bureau released the first 2010 results today. The figures show that the resident population of the country on April 1 of this year was nearly 309 million people (308,745,538).
That’s a 9.7 percent over the 2000 resident population.
Hector Moldonado, a partner specialist with the Census Bureau says for Alaska, the population increase was higher than the national average at 13.3 percent.
Middle Schoolers Build Underwater ROVs
Casey Kelly, KTOO – Juneau
Seventh graders at Floyd Dryden Middle School are learning advanced math and science concepts this year by building underwater remote operated vehicles. The SeaPerch program trains teachers to build the robots and gives them ideas for classroom use. The first National SeaPerch Challenge will be held in Philadelphia next May. And as KTOO’s Casey Kelly reports, some Floyd Dryden students hope to compete.
State Will Sue Over Polar Bear Habitat Designation
Associated Press
The state of Alaska says it will sue the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service over protections recently put in place to help polar bears faced with the effects of climate change.
Polar bears are listed as threatened under the Endangered Species Act, and as such more than 187,000 square miles of critical habitat in the Arctic has been designated to help the species recover.
The state says the critical habitat includes areas where there is little or no evidence that the areas are crucial to polar bear conservation.
The state on Tuesday put the federal agency on notice that it intends to sue unless the critical habitat designation is changed. If no action is taken in the next 60 days, the state will file a lawsuit.
UAF Scientist Tapped to Lead Polar Bear Study
Dan Bross, KUAC – Fairbanks
A University of Alaska Fairbanks scientist is being tapped by the state to look at how polar bears have adapted to climate changes historically. The Alaska Department of Commerce, Community and Economic Development is providing a $400,000 grant for a study led by Matt Cronin, a UAF animal geneticist based the Palmer Experimental farm. Cronin says the idea is to gain perspective on how the bears may respond to current climate warming.
Cronin’s past research has included work for the oil industry, and other partisan funders, but he says he’s not concerned about his data being misused to advocate for a particular position.
Cronin will work with scientists from the U.S. Department of Agriculture and three other universities on the state of Alaska funded polar bear genetics project. He says they’ll also be reviewing existing genetic data on sea lions and Beluga whales, two other species whose decline has been linked to climate change, and for which protective measure threaten development in Alaska.
Eagle River Composer Rejoices in Chilly Weather
Ellen Lockyer, KSKA – Anchorage
Tuesday marks the Winter Solstice, the official first day of the season. Dark afternoons and blustery snowfalls sometimes bring groans even from hardy Alaskans. But Eagle River composer Kevin Barnett finds reason to rejoice in the chilly days at year’s end, and his new cd, Alpenglow, is proof.
Audio clip: Adobe Flash Player (version 9 or above) is required to play this audio clip. Download the latest version here. You also need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.

description.hltext_display: Superinfektion: Auf neuen Fieberanstieg achten
description.content:
Köln (dpa/tmn) Kinder mit einer Influenza sind besonders empfänglich für zusätzliche Bakterieninfektionen. Deshalb sollten Eltern auf einen erneuten Fieberanstieg bei einer Grippe achten. Das weist auf eine sogenannte Superinfektion hin.
Eltern sollten bei Grippe-kranken Kindern auf Fieber achten. (Bild: Pleul/dpa/tmn)
«Wenn am dritten bis siebten Tag der Grippeerkrankung das Fieber wieder ansteigt, besteht der Verdacht auf eine solche zusätzliche bakterielle Infektion», warnt Ursel Lindlbauer-Eisenach vom Berufsverband der Kinder- und Jugendärzte in Köln. Diese sogenannte Superinfektion sollte rasch mit Antibiotika behandelt werden. «Denn eine bakterielle Superinfektion kann sich in kurzer Zeit zu einer lebensbedrohlichen Situation entwickeln.»
Für Kinder sei also nicht nur die Influenza selbst ein erhebliches Gesundheitsrisiko, sondern auch durch sie begünstigte bakterielle Zweitinfektionen. «Auch im Hinblick auf solche möglichen Komplikationen sollten sie deshalb durch eine Impfung vor der Influenza geschützt sein», rät Lindlbauer-Eisenach, die auch Mitglied der Ständigen Impfkommission (STIKO) am Robert Koch-Institut ist.
Die meisten Kinder, die in den USA zwischen 2003 und 2008 wegen einer Influenzaerkrankung ins Krankenhaus mussten, hatten sich eine zusätzliche bakterielle Lungenentzündung zugezogen. Diese führte zu schwerwiegenden Komplikationen, so dass die Kindern intensivmedizinisch behandelt werden mussten. Der amerikanischen Gesundheitsbehörde CDC zufolge waren Kinder zwischen einem halben und vier Jahren und solche, die unter Asthma litten, am stärksten betroffen. Für die Zukunft prognostizieren Experten der CDC, dass bei Grippeepidemien Sekundärinfektionen mit Bakterien eine der Hauptursachen für Todesfälle sein werden.
Ähnliche Ergebnisse fand das «Community-Acquired Pneumonia Competence Network» (CAPNETZ) für Deutschland. Demnach kann eine bakterielle Zweitinfektion das Sterberisiko der Patienten um ein Dreifaches von drei auf neun Prozent erhöhen. Nach neuen Erkenntnissen zur Wechselwirkung von Grippeviren und bakteriellen Zweitinfektionen erleichtern Grippeviren offenbar das Eindringen von Bakterien in menschliche Zellen. Dabei greifen die Bakterien meist die schon geschwächten Atemwege an, oder sie breiten sich im ganzen Körper aus. Laut Lindlbauer-Eisenach empfiehlt die STIKO die Grippeimpfung insbesondere für Kinder und Jugendliche mit chronischen Krankheiten der Atemwege, Herz-Kreislauf-Erkrankungen, Stoffwechselerkrankungen oder einer Immunschwäche.
Lesen Sie täglich mehr in der Lausitzer Rundschau oder werden Sie ePaper-Abonnent. Jetzt hier bestellen...

description.hltext_display: Need to preserve richness of diversity and multi-culturism: Manmohan Singh
description.content: New Delhi, Dec 22 : The Prime Minister, Dr. Manmohan Singh, on Wednesday said that it is a major challenge for all of us to ensure that the richness of our diversity and multi-culturism is preserved and nourished. Speaking on the occasion of conferment of Indian Council of Philosophical Research''s lifetime achievement award here, Dr. Manmohan Singh said: " We need to preserve this essential unity, this Indianness that has been strengthened and enriched by the various strands of thought that constitute the great Indian philosophical tradition. It is a major challenge for all of us and especially our intellectuals."Stating that India has a glorious philosophical tradition, Dr. Singh said: "Philosophers have been the architects of our ancient civilization - a civilization that has been continuous and unbroken for thousands of years, despite the remarkable demographic, political and economic changes that have taken place in our country from time to time. "Our country is characterized by enormous diversity. We are blessed with a multitude of languages. All major religions of the world are represented in India in good numbers," he added"There are numerous ethnic groups with their own distinctive identities. Yet, we are one nation, one people, sharing the same spirit of Indianness,'' he said. He said sometimes, philosophers are seen as mere arm-chair speculators, who have the luxury of leisure. This, I believe, is a misconception. "Philosophy is not removed from living but organically related to it. At a practical level, we need to break the artificial barrier between theory and practice," he said.With the rapid expansion of the knowledge frontier and the consequent multiplication of areas of specialization, Dr. Singh pointed out that there was an increasing need for interdisciplinary studies and for unified knowledge. "Philosophy can play a pivotal role in ensuring this outcome. As the mother of all sciences, philosophy is necessarily inter-disciplinary. Therefore, it should be pursued not merely as a separate discipline, like economics or political science, but as a trans-disciplinary subject taught along with other subjects," he added."Ethics should be an important element in the curriculum of professional schools. Again philosophies of law, education, history, politics, and science need to be studied for consummate and all-round preparation of our students enrolled in those respective fields," he said.He further hoped that the Indian Council of Philosophical Research will encourage efforts in that direction.

description.hltext_display: [사설] 상상 초월하는 이대엽 일가의 비리
description.content:
민선 3, 4기 8년간 성남시장을 지냈던 이대엽씨와 그 일가가 시장 재임 시절 저지른 비리는 혀를 내두르게 한다. 이들 비리에 성남시 공무원들까지 대거 관여했다고 하니 기가 막힌다. 지역사회의 얽히고설킨 비리 사슬도 적나라하게 드러났다. 토착 비리의 결정판이다. 토착 비리의 절반가량이 공무원 비리라고 하는데 성남시의 경우 공무원 조직이 바로 부패와 비리의 온상이었다.
20일 검찰 수사 결과에 따르면 이씨와 큰조카 부부 등 일가 6명은 2002년 7월부터 올 6월까지 건설업자와 공무원들에게서 15억여원을 받아 챙겼다. 허위 영수증 작성 방법으로 시 예산을 횡령하기도 했다. 1200만원 상당의 로열살루트 50년산 위스키도 뇌물 목록 중 하나였다. 동학혁명의 원인이 됐던 전북 고부군수 조병갑의 탐욕을 보는 듯하다는 게 한 누리꾼의 탄식이다.
‘소(小) 시장’으로 군림한 큰조카는 관급공사에 영향력을 행사하고 거액을 수수했다. 큰조카와 그 부인은 공무원 인사에도 개입하고 금품을 받았다. 현대판 매관매직을 자행한 것이다. 시 공무원들은 각종 이권에 개입해 ‘검은 돈’을 챙기는 등 비리에 합세했다. 윗물이 썩었으니 아랫물이 맑을 리가 없다.
지방자치단체의 비리는 어제 오늘의 일이 아니다. 시장과 군수 등 단체장들의 힘이 막강해 비리에 연루될 소지가 많다. 각종 사업 인허가, 예산 집행, 인사 등에 있어 전권을 행사하기 때문이다. 반면 지자체 감시 시스템은 사실상 전무하다. 지자체 내부 감사는 한계가 있다. 견제를 해야 할 지방의회도 제 역할을 못한다. 지자체 비리가 근절되지 못하는 이유다. 외부 감사 강화 등 특단의 대책이 요구된다.

description.content: De AEX-index zal woensdag bij de opening in de buurt blijven van de slotstand die op dinsdag werd neergezet, verwacht vermogensbeheerder Danny Geerken van het Haags Effektenkantoor. ,,De opening zal weinig spannend zijn, maar de markt is vriendelijk gestemd.''

description.hltext_display: 狂刺妻200刀 電器工墮樓亡
Two blows against Yemen, and a real sectarian threat
description.content:
Author: Brian O'Neill
Yemen, as is now mentioned to the point of throat-clearing banality, is a fragile state. The droning repetition of this meme, unfortunately, does not make it any less true. Yemen, which can ill afford new stresses, was met late last month with two potential catastrophes - one from old words, the other from new bombs.
The first is the WikiLeaks document dump, a global phenomenon which has proved incredibly embarrassing to the United States. Inside Yemen, however, the leaks are less uncomfortable than they are dangerous.
In one cable, President Ali Abdullah Saleh is quoted as giving the US a green light to attack the Yemeni branch of al Qa'eda, al Qa'eda in the Arabian Peninsula (AQAP), so long as both sides claim attacks are a Yemeni action. In the same meeting, the deputy prime minister mentions how he just got through lying to Parliament about the provenance of a strike (which killed many Yemeni civilians).
Analysts might shrug off the tone, but for people inside Yemen who don't have the same level of cynical detachment it has been like lightning.
In the cables, Mr Saleh is seemingly revealed as conforming to the image that anti-regime propagandists have painted: someone who is far more concerned with helping foreign powers than he is with helping his countrymen. He is opening up the country to imperialist drones and letting infidels attack Muslims, or so the local logic goes.
Mr Saleh's principle domestic challenge is that of legitimacy, and any event that questions his commitment to the nation is potentially devastating. The Houthi rebellion in the north, the southern secessionist movement, the threat of AQAP, general discontent: they all have as their root the idea that the central government is illegitimate. These cables can only accentuate that problem.
And yet, WikiLeaks is not even Yemen's most explosive challenge of the last few weeks. For that, one must look to a troubling rise in sectarian violence.
An AQAP attack on a Zaidi funeral in late November could prove to be far more damaging and bloody to Yemen's tenuous internal coherence, and not just in the long run. The attack was on the funeral of one of the leaders of the Houthi rebellion, a strike that threatens to open up a distinctly un-Yemeni brand of sectarian violence.
The Houthis are Zaidis, which is a from of Shiism, but its form is far different from the Twelver branch of Islam found in Iran and Iraq. Zaidi jurisprudence resembles Sunni thinking, and is popularly called another school of Sunni Islam. Sunnis and Shiites in Yemen historically have been virtually indistinguishable, and for all its other problems the country has avoided the mutual charges of apostasy you see elsewhere.
Saudi influence has begun to change that, though, and indeed the backlash to aggressive Wahhabi preaching was one of the engines of Zaidi political revivalism, its strongest manifestation being the Houthi rebellion. Yet communal violence had long been absent. As much as people have painted the rebellion as a Shiite one, it has always been political in nature, tied deeply to Yemeni history. Its religious nature only came in the accusation that Mr Saleh, himself a Zaidi, was selling out the country to Israel. Sunni Islamists sympathised.
What had made AQAP so dangerous was their patience, and their unwillingness to turn Yemen into an Iraq-like quagmire of sectarian division. They had avoided the mindless violence seen in other al Qa'eda venues, and hadn't attacked the so-called "ancient enemy" of Shiism. You didn't have attacks in markets, at funerals or mosques (with one possible exception in 2008). This lack of wanton bloodlust has helped them avoid backlash inside Yemen.
Until now. It is the exact nature of the November funeral attack that is uncertain; AQAP's statement of responsibility was strange and oddly vague and reactive, unusual for an organisation with such a sophisticated propaganda machine. It is possible that the Yemeni bombers acted without direct approval from the top, which itself would show a dangerous lack of command and control, and the leadership reacted clumsily in an attempt to prove they still held tightly to the organisation.
Regardless, though, the operation was sanctioned, if even retroactively. What had once been words is now action.
It is impossible to understate the dangers of this. Depending on Houthi reaction, this could open up another fighting front in a country that already has several intertwined and dizzily confusing ones. Even if the Houthis somehow shrug this off, a campaign by AQAP would be impossible to ignore. From a very narrow view, this might be seen as a positive. Better AQAP bleeds itself out play-acting dusty blood feuds than to plot against the West.
But there are two problems with this reasoning. The first is that this kind of ancient and invented sectarianism appeals to hardened jihadis, and AQAP is on a serious recruitment drive. The second is that it could lead to horrific violence, in itself a nightmare, and that violence could hurl Yemen's shaky stability off the cliff. From both a humanitarian and a counterterrorism perspective, this is unacceptable.
There are now wider divisions in Yemen than there were just a month ago. The few are separating the many. Mr Saleh is even further isolated in his tower, and a small group of men are actively trying to wreck Yemen's famed tolerance. These are potentially disastrous developments in a country whose cracks are threatening to completely swallow the land.
Brian O'Neill is a former writer and editor for the Yemen Observer. He is currently an independent analyst in Chicago

description.hltext_display: Rebel girls hang on to edge St. Charles
description.content:
Email Print Comments
Four players scored at least 13 points as the Southland girls basketball team beat St. Charles (3-5 overall) 74-66 in Adams Tuesday.
The Rebels (7-1 overall) never led big, but they were able to hang on.
“We didn’t play one of our better games and we had to grind it out,” Southland head coach Bob Sheehan said. “It’s nice to have balance and not have to rely on one player to score.”
Southland scoring: Jana Schammel, 17; Madilyn Schmitz, 17; Haley Kirkpatrick, 16; Brandi Schammel, 13; Lindsey Bottema, 6; Kelli Smith, 5

description.hltext_display: [사설] 겸허하게 애기봉 성탄트리를 바라보자
description.content:
21일 저녁 경기도 김포시 하성면 가금리에 위치한 최전방 애기봉 등탑의 성탄 트리가 불을 밝혔다. 지난 2004년 6월 제2차 남북 장성급 군사회담에서 군사분계선 지역의 선전활동을 중지하기로 합의함에 따라 중단된 이후 7년 만에 다시 점등한 것이다. 이 합의는 지구촌 어디서나 밝히는 성탄 트리를 군사적 선전활동으로 인식했다는 점에서 애당초 문제가 있는 것이었다.
애기봉 성탄 트리 점등의 의미는 성탄 소식을 만방에 전하며 사랑과 희생, 섬김과 나눔의 그리스도 정신을 남과 북이 함께 되새기기 위한 것이다. 올해 애기봉 등탑이 재점등되는 과정에서 일부 오해가 빚어지기도 했다. 북한을 자극할 필요가 있느냐는 의견이 그것이다. 그러나 이는 성탄 트리 점등의 역사와 의미를 간과하고 일방적 주장을 수용하는 데서 오는 오해라고 봐야 할 것이다.
한강과 임진강이 만나 서해바다로 흘러가는 곳에 솟아 있는 높이 155m의 애기봉 정상은 북한의 개풍군과 송악산까지 바라볼 수 있어 관광객과 실향민들이 많이 찾는 서부전선의 아름다운 전망지다. 6·25전쟁 직후 북녘 동포들과 성탄의 기쁨을 함께하기 위해 교계에서 소나무 트리를 세운 것이 이곳 크리스마스 트리의 연원이다. 그후 1968년 30m 높이의 철탑 전망대가 들어서 개신교와 천주교가 격년으로 불을 밝혀 왔다.
따라서 애기봉 등탑 점등은 한국전 이후 성탄절을 맞는 한국 기독교계가 새롭게 향유(享有)한 문화이자 북한과 더불어 나눔과 화해의 메시지를 공유하고자 하는 의지의 상징물이다. 이것이 누군가를 자극한다는 것은 ‘나눔’과 ‘화해’의 정신을 ‘박탈’과 ‘갈등’으로 뒤바꾸려는 전도(顚倒)된 의식이라고 해야 할 것이다.
이같이 순수한 점등에 대해 북한은 20일 노동신문을 통해 “대형 전광판에 의한 심리모략전이 새로운 무장충돌을 일으킬 수 있는 위험한 망동”이라며 “북남 사이에 첨예한 긴장국면이 조성되고 있는 속에서 상대방을 자극하는 도발 소동도 무력충돌과 전면전쟁의 발화점으로 될 수 있다”고 주장했다. 북한 인민군 전선중부 지구사령관은 천안함 폭침 이후인 지난 5월 “(남한이) 심리전 수단을 새로 설치하면 그것을 없애버리기 위한 직접 조준 격파사격이 개시될 것”이라고 위협한 바 있다. 최근에는 부쩍 경계병을 증가시키며 긴장을 고조시켜왔다.
우리 군은 만약의 사태에 대비하기 위해 강화된 위기조치 기구를 운용하면서 전투기 등을 대기시키고 이지스함인 세종대왕함과 독도함의 지원 태세를 유지하고 있다. 여기서 분명히 할 것은 애기봉의 크리스마스 트리 점등이 성탄의 축복을 나누기 위한 것이지 어떤 갈등을 야기하려는 것이 아니라는 사실이다.
이것을 문제 삼는 이는 그만큼 폐쇄적이고 그 내부에 성탄의 불빛이 스며들어야 할 필요성이 높은 사람이라 할 것이다. 베이징이나 모스크바에서도 해마다 성탄 트리는 불을 밝히고, 크리스마스 캐럴은 울려 퍼진다. 겸허한 마음으로 성탄의 불빛을 바라볼 일이다.

description.hltext_display: Momentous ****** at Momentum Investo
description.content:
I've had an investment with Momentum Investo since 2005. The policy matured on 30 November 2010. In August 2010, I filled out and submitted all the required forms, along with my ID, to Radha Jogibhai. I went through a checklist and confirmed that I had submitted all the required documents, I have the emails to prove that. However, Radha first insisted that I had documents outstanding. On 1 October, she emailed me to say she had re-checked my submission and indeed everything was there.
An excerpt from her email:
'We would like to confirm that I have went through the documentation again and the document is indeed there. Please ignore the requirements e-mail and accept our sincere apologies for this.
We will proceed with the request 30112010 i.e maturity date. Payment should be made approximately 5-7 working days thereafter.'
I was told that no further action was required from me, my money would be deposited into my account 5-7 days after the maturity of my policy, which was 30 November. It is now 21 December and I have been unable to get a decent response from Momentum as to why I don't have my funds.
I've repeatedly called and emailed Momentum, with no adequate response.

description.hltext_display: Frauen wollen sichere und schonende Verhütung
description.content:
Nürnberg (dpa/tmn) Eine Verhütungsmethode muss sehr sicher sein und sollte den Körper möglichst wenig belasten: Diese Kriterien sind Frauen bei der Auswahl besonders wichtig. Das hat eine repräsentative Online-Umfrage der GfK Marktforschung aus Nürnberg ergeben.
Außerdem legen Frauen Wert auf eine geringe Hormonbelastung und wenig Nebenwirkungen bei der Verhütung. Befragt wurden im Auftrag des Unternehmens Bayer HealthCare rund 1040 Frauen zwischen 30 bis 35 Jahren Frauen, 54 Prozent davon mit einem oder mehreren Kindern.

description.hltext_display: 視窗7手機6週熱賣150萬支
description.content:
（法新社華盛頓21日電） 微軟（Microsoft）今天首度公布內建Windows Phone 7軟體的新款智慧型手機銷售數字，它說，首6週銷量已超過150萬支。
主管新款視窗智慧型手機市場行銷的微軟副總裁柏格（Achim Berg）說，銷售「符合預期，尤其是與它廠推出的新平台作比較。」
柏格在聲明中說：「我們很滿意，推出首6週，手機製造商就大賣150萬支，有助建立客戶動力和零售市占率。」
微軟在10月推出最新版手機作業系統，意圖收復被蘋果iPhone、黑莓機和谷歌Android行動裝置搶占的失土。
生產Windows Phone 7手機的廠商包括台灣的宏達電（HTC）、南韓三星（Samsung）和樂金電子公司（LGElectronics）以及美國戴爾電腦（Dell）。（譯者：中央社王黛麗）

description.hltext_display: Det store paradokset
description.author: Ketil Bø Daglig leder, Trollhetta
description.content:
Er redd for handlingslammelse: Kronikkforfatteren mener vi ikke kan tro at Norge skal forbli verdens rikeste land om vi ikke snart for alvor begynner å tenke på kommende generasjoner. Her er regjeringen Stoltenberg og noen av de mest sentrale medlemmene under åpningen av Stortinget i høst.
Norge er et av verdens rikeste land, regjeringen har absolutt flertall og vi har en fri presse, likevel har Norge store strukturelle problemer. Dette er et paradoks som trenger nærmere analyse.
I en kronikk begrenset til ca. 6000 tegn, må nødvendigvis argumentene bli noe overfladiske og poengene satt litt på spissen, men det får stå sin prøve.
At Norge for tiden er et av verdens rikeste land er et faktum som vi ikke behøver å gå nærmere inn på, derfor kan vi konsentrere oss om de to andre parametrene.
Den nye generasjon med «profesjonelle» politikere mangler ofte kunnskap, yrkeserfaring og visjoner, og er langt på vei handlingslammet i en komplisert og dynamisk verden hvor pilene begynner å peke nedover, i hvert fall for den vestlige verden.
Mens gjennomsnittsforsinkelsen på togene i Japan er 20 sekunder, er vi fornøyd når forsinkelsene kan regnes i minutter. Den tid Norge var et av Europas fattigste land, hadde vi vilje og evne til å bygge ut jernbanenettet både sørover, vestover og nordover. Nå som vi er et av verdens rikeste land, klarer vi ikke engang å vedlikeholde eksisterende skinner og materiell. Enda mer problematisk er det når politikerne i sin argumentasjon og bevilgninger ikke tar innover seg at kvaliteten på infrastrukturen er avhengig av nybygging, vedlikehold og drift.
Selv om det er kostbart å bygge og vedlikeholde veier i Norge, er det en tankevekker når veiene våre er i dårligere stand og gatene mer forsøplet enn det vi opplever i utlandet, en rekke utviklingsland inkludert.
Er det ikke rimelig å anta at våre etterkommere vil foretrekke å overta et land med konkurransedyktig kunnskapsnivå og infrastruktur, enn et oljefond med usikre investeringer?
Norge burde ha «et av verdens beste skolesystemer», men internasjonale undersøkelser viser at skoleverket stagnerer, fra folkeskole til universitet. Alle nivåer lider under begrensede bevilgninger, målsettinger og ambisjoner.
Eksempelvis viser de sist tilgjengelige resultatene fra PISA-undersøkelsen, som sammenligner 15-åringers kunnskaper og ferdigheter, at norske elever skårer svakest i Norden og klart lavere enn OECD-gjennomsnittet. Foreløpig har vi ressurser nok til å bygge og drifte et av verdens beste skolesystemer som kan danne fundamentet, for en kunnskapsnasjon som skal sørge for at vi har noe å leve av når oljen og gassen tar slutt. Men da må dette prioriteres nå.
Mange sykehus mangler moderne utstyr og har ikke kapasitet til å behandle pasientene når de har behov. Lokalsykehus legges ned. Dette går ut over pasienters livskvalitet og kan i verste fall føre til unødvendig død eller invaliditet. Det er heller ikke nok sykehjemsplasser til folk som har behov for pleie og omsorg. På toppen av dette vet vi at en eldrebølge er på vei.
Den landbaserte industrien har problemer, og vi er i ferd med å miste arbeidsplasser og kompetanse som det har tatt årtier å bygge opp.
Dette er bare noen eksempler som viser at problemene i Norge er blitt akutte og at de møtes med politisk handlingslammelse.
Hovedargumentene som skal rettferdiggjøre handlingslammelsen er:
Norge har internasjonale forpliktelser som et av verdens rikeste land.
Trusselen om økt inflasjon og dermed redusert konkurranseevne.
Handlingsregelen.
Men er disse argumentene holdbare?
En rekke av våre «internasjonale forpliktelser» har vi definert selv. Vi skal bidra til å lindre nød i andre land, men det bør ikke overskygge politikernes ansvar for å bygge landet for fremtidige generasjoner.
Dersom det er økt inflasjon en er redd for når det gjelder bruk av ressurser til å investere i infrastruktur, er det mulig å bygge moderne høyhastighetsjernbaner, veier, skoler sykehus, aldershjem osv. med importert arbeidskraft hvor lønningene betales i arbeiderens hjemland og utstyret kjøpes fra utlandet.
Ved å ta slike grep kan «Handlingsregelen» revurderes uten at det fører til negative sideeffekter. For tiden er oljefondet på omkring 3000 milliarder kroner så foreløpig kan vi rette opp mye av forfallet.
Om vi ikke er villig til å ta slike grep, må vi ta i bruk mer drastiske virkemidler:
Øke pensjonsalderen, redusere lønnsveksten, redusere trygde- og velferdsordninger, redusere antall administrativt ansatte i det offentlige, redusere internasjonal bistand osv.
Den militære delen av vårt bidrag til Afghanistan koster Norge menneskeliv og milliarder av kroner. Det er diskutabelt om vårt bidrag hjelper til å løse problemene eller til å forsterke dem.
Kjøp av klimakvoter i utlandet og regnskogprosjektene vil koste oss dyrt, men med usikre og i beste fall midlertidige gevinster. De menneskeskapte CO2-utslippene er bare en liten del av klimaproblemene, derfor må det være klokere å bruke disse ressursene til bærekraftige løsninger med ambisiøse forskningsprosjekter på f.eks. alternative energikilder og biologiske løsninger.
I en verden med økende folkemengde og økende behov for energi, vil ensidig satsing på reduksjon og lagring av CO2 i beste fall bare utsette problemene. Dessuten vil aktiv bruk av ressursene våre gi økt kunnskap og konkurransedyktige bedrifter som bonus.
Vi er nå i ferd med å passere inntektstoppen fra olje- og gassressursene, imens stagnerer landet vårt. Nå må vi prioritere resten av olje- og gassalderen til å bygge landet og sikre fremtiden for våre etterkommere. Har vi i den forbindelse en plan B dersom den globale oppvarmingen ikke lar seg begrense av forsøkene på å redusere CO2-utslippene?
Dette er problemstillinger den frie presse burde være opptatt av: analysere, gi objektiv informasjon, grave og stille kritiske spørsmål til politikere og forskere. I stedet velger de minste motstands vei ved ukritisk å henge seg på det som til enhver tid er politisk korrekt, sensurere innspill som ikke er politisk korrekte og lage storm i vann-glass om saker som i en større sammenheng er ubetydelige.
ketil.Bo@online.no
