description.hltext_display: النجيفي يدعو الدول ?الصديقة والشقيقة? لفتح صفحة جديدة مع العراق
description.content: بغداد/ اصوات العراق: طالب رئيس مجلس النواب اسامة النجيفي، الثلاثاء، الدول ?الصديقة والشقيقة? بما فيها الكويت الى فتح صفحة جديدة مع العراق. وقال النجيفي اثناء كلمة له في جلسة البرلمان المخصصة للتصويت على الحكومة الجديدة إن ?العراق وفي الوقت الذي يؤكد فيه التزامه التام بما ترتب عليه بموجب نظام العقوبات يدعو الدول الشقيقة والصديقة المعنية به وفي المقدمة منها دولة الكويت الشقيقة الى فتح صفحة جديدة وازالة كل اثار الماضي السيئة?. كما دعا الكويت الى ?الشروع في مفاوضات جادة ورصينة لمعالجة كل القضايا العالقة بروح اخوية صادقة ونيات واضحة وصريحة وثابتة وحرص قومي مسؤول وشراكة حقيقية في صنع مستقبل افضل للمنطقة يسوده السلام والوئام واحترام الخصوصيات الوطنية لكل طرف?. واشار النجيفي الى ضرورة ?توسيع الأفق الديمقراطي الشعبي بإحترام حرية تأسيس الأحزاب وممارسة التعبير عن افكارها والترويج لها وكفالة دعمها لتنمو نمواً طبيعياً في حاضنتها الوطنية بعيداً عن أي نمو هجين دخيل غير طبيعي في افلاك وحاضنات غير وطنية وضمان تنافسها الشريف في المراحل الانتخابية اللاحقة?. واوضح ان ?في هذا وحده نضمن أمناً مجتمعياً ووطنياً حصيناً, وفي السياق ذاته نؤكد حتمية ايلاء الإعلام الوطني الحر المستقل اهمية اساسية اسهاماً في اشاعة الوعي الديمقراطي بين ابناء شعبنا وانضاجه?، مبيناً ان ? الصحافة الوطنية والصحفيون العراقيون ادوا دورا كبيراً وتاريخياً في حماية الوطن والشعب من عبث العابثين وارهاب الارهابيين وفي احقاق الحق ومناهضة الباطل ودفعوا جراء ذلك دماء زكية طاهرة?. ودعا الحكومة الجديدة الى ?احترام حقوق الانسان الاجتماعية والاقتصادية والمدنية والثقافية والعقائدية وكفالة الحريات الفردية الشخصية والجماعية وحمايتها من أي اذى قد يدهمها من اية جهة كانت فلا سلطة في البلاد غير السلطات الثلاث ووفق محدداتها الدستورية?. � وطالب بـ?نهاء� مظاهر عسكرة المجتمع وحصر السلاح بيد اجهزة الدولة المختصة ومعالجة انهيار ثقة المواطن بمؤسسات الدولة بحكم استشراء الفساد� واشهار الفساد والمفسدين امام الشعب وتقديمهم للقضاء كي يقول فيهم كلمة العدل والقصاص?. ومنح البرلمان ثقته للبرنامج الحكومي لرئيس الوزراء نوري المالكي واعضاء وزارته، عصر الثلاثاء، بعد مخاض عسير دام نحو تسعة اشهر منذ اجراء الانتخابات لإختيار اعضاء مجلس النواب في السابع من اذارمارس الماضي. وكان المالكي قدم اعضاء تشكيلته الوزارية اليوم الى البرلمان والتي ضمت 41 وزارة فيما احتفظ لنفسه بإدارة وزارات الداخلية والدفاع والأمن الوطني بالوكالة بشكل مؤقت كذلك اسند لوزراء حقائب بالوكالة لحين تسمية الوزراء الأصليين. ع ح م (خ) ص ع ز

description.hltext_display: Deming couple help out Mexican border town
description.content:
Local governments (853)
Education (1099)
Social affairs (2740)
Industries (2866)
Business (4982)
Crime (5060)
Government and politics (5230)
General news (8338)
Places:
Deming (7)
Mexico (147)
Central America (155)
New Mexico (368)
Latin America and Caribbean (484)
United States (23507)
North America (23697)
PALOMAS, Mexico — Bloodied and bruised by the economic recession, drug-fueled violence and loss of tourism, this border town south of Columbus has been in dire need of a helping hand.
Two Minnesota transplants now living in Deming, Peter and Polly Edmunds, have extended theirs.
In the last two years, Polly Edmunds, 67, has helped organize a small business that employs seven Palomas women who make oilcloth products such as handbags and tablecloths, which Polly markets in the U.S., including stores in Santa Fe, Albuquerque and Las Cruces.
Peter Edmunds, a 71-year-old who used to run a home restoration business, has concentrated on promoting the use of low-cost, locally built solar ovens that locals can use to cook meals while saving on gas expenses.
And, in November, the Edmundses, founding members of a nonprofit group called Border Partners, launched their latest effort: a school food program to provide burritos to about 250 needy children in three Palomas schools.
"It's a very generous thing for him to do because he's giving his time to people he doesn't even know," said Palomas body shop owner Hector Ramirez recently while meeting with Peter Edmunds. Ramirez, who is involved in the burrito program, added. "I feel like this is a man that God sent to us." At one of the elementary schools where about 200 children are fed through the burrito program, principal Angel Garibay said the meals have provided a boost to the children and helped them better focus on their studies.
When children are hungry, Garibay said, "Progress diminishes. The learning curve just stays low."
Gesturing toward Edmunds and his local partners, Garibay said, "Thanks to the help of the people here, we're making some improvements."
Over a year ago, the Edmundses, enthusiastic users of solar cookers, began demonstrating how to cook with the simple wood and mylar structures in Palomas. Last spring, Peter Edmunds and a Palomas volunteer, 24-year-old Luis Garcia who acts as a translator, built four solar ovens at a local secondary school with the idea that students could use them to heat or cook meals or for science experiments.
Concerned the solar cookers weren't used more, Edmunds and Garcia went to meet with the principal, who said his primary concern was students who were coming to school hungry and had no money for lunch.
Further inquiries led to the realization that students at local elementary schools were also going to school hungry. Peter Edmunds quickly raised about $400 from a few friends and Border Partners board members, which was used to buy 2,000 pounds of pinto beans at a discount from Diaz Farms in Luna County.
The beans, which will produce an estimated 10,000 servings over several months, were trucked to Palomas on Nov. 17. About one dozen Palomas volunteers make tortillas by hand and prepare burritos in two shifts, starting at 6 a.m.
Edmunds said he hopes the burrito program becomes self-sustaining. To that end, Garcia has tried to raise funds by showing films to children and their parents on weekends at a local disco. Ramirez collects recyclable material that he can sell in Ciudad JuÃ¡rez to generate more money.
"It's empowering a bunch of people down here," Edmunds says of the burrito program. "It's telling people, 'Hey, we can change this.' "
The Edmundses finance the small business run by seven Palomas women who make bags, aprons, placemats and other products out of oilcloth. Polly Edmunds said the women work about 10 hours a week and make about $60, roughly what they might make working full-time at a Ciudad JuÃ¡rez assembly plant.
The work, Polly Edmunds said, provides the main source of income for five of the women.
Over the last four years, as drug cartels began waging war against one another, the Mexican Army and law enforcement, violence came to Palomas, too. Dozens of people have either been killed or simply disappeared from the town, and restaurants, hotels and other businesses have closed as tourism dwindled and the northbound flow of illegal border crossers dried up.
The town's mayor, 27-year-old Miguel Angel Chacon, said the population has shrunk from about 8,000 to between 5,000 and 6,000.
In October 2009, unknown assailants snatched the town's former mayor, Estanislao "Tanys" Garcia as he drove around the main plaza. His bullet-riddled body was later found in a car that had been set ablaze south of town.
In late November, Mexican soldiers discovered 20 bodies buried in clandestine graves south of town. The Mexican press reported that the body of a man, apparently strangled, was discovered in the Palomas plaza on Dec. 12.
Several Palomas residents said that, despite the violence, their town is still a good place for visitors searching for prescription drugs, dental work or an inexpensive meal.
"Palomas is a quiet town," said Leticia Olono, head of the state social services agency. "Let the people know they shouldn't be afraid to come. We're friendly people."
In response to questions about whether they fear the violence, ordinary Mexicans in recent years have repeated a simple mantra that seems partly wishful thinking: If you are not involved with drug traffickers, you are safe.
But in recent years, criminal organizations have increasingly turned to kidnapping and extortion to make up lost drug revenues.
Dolores Coronado, a Palomas resident who works in Deming, said, "Those who feel threatened, they've already left. But for others, it's life. You can't just get up and leave your life."
Polly Edmunds said she and her husband are undeterred by the violence. "We don't think about that much any more," said Polly Edmunds. "We are so committed to these people and our projects that we just can't think about that because we know it wouldn't change our minds about going."
As he made his rounds in Palomas recently, it was evident that Peter Edmunds has lots of plans.
Recently, he organized a meeting for locals to discuss ways to beautify several neglected city parks, and he mentioned the possibility of acquiring discarded playground equipment from a park in Luna County.
While meeting with local government officials in Palomas' city hall, Peter Edmunds promised to connect volunteers at an Episcopal church in Truth or Consequences hoping to provide Christmas presents clothes and a toy with about 80 needy children.
At a Mexican middle school, where the principal said he wanted to start a garden, Edmunds said he could provide a variety of seeds donated by an American nonprofit group he contacted. "We're good beggars," Edmunds joked.
At the same school, Edmunds is making preliminary plans to use lightweight bricks made of recycled newspaper to enclose what is now an open-air shelter above a concrete slab. During one recent afternoon, schoolchildren used the slab for a soccer field. With walls, the shelter will be transformed into a gymnasium and an auditorium where community gatherings can be held.
"I know we can do this. It just takes time," Edmunds said. Later, he told another Palomas resident, "If we live long enough, we'll get all this done."

description.hltext_display: Dossier : upgrade portable avec un SSD
description.author: mantidor@cowcotland.com (mantidor
description.content: Avec ses SSD, Crucial est une des seules marques à proposer un kit de transfert. Un kit de transfert intégrant un adaptateur SATA vers USB, ainsi qu'un logiciel de clonage. Forcement, on a également un SSD, un petit C300 64 Go. Notre confrère 59 Hardware nous propose ce jour de vérifier l'efficacité de ce kit de transfert, mais aussi de vérifier les performances du SSD. C'est On The Source."Qui na pas rêvé de changer en toute simplicité le disque dur de son portable sans tous réinstaller ? Des solutions existent comme le clonage par exemple, directement sous Windows. Il est donc possible daugmenter la capacité de son disque dur très facilement, les performances sen trouvent améliorées, les disques récents étant généralement plus rapides. Pour encore plus de performances il est même possible dinstaller un SSD, cest ce que nous allons tester aujourdhui. Nous en profiterons pour comparer les différentes solutions, le stockage initial, un disque dur plus récent et enfin le SSD. "

description.hltext_display: Новозеландские военные рассекретили информацию об НЛО
description.content:
В частности, среди рассекреченных материалов оказались свидетельства о появлении загадочных огней в небе над Южным островом в 1978 году. Тогда это явление вызвало большой интерес не только в Новой Зеландии, но и за ее пределами - многие зарубежные издания опубликовали статьи о появлении странных световых объектов.
Современные военные полагают, что огни над Южным островом скорее всего не имеют никакого отношения к инопланетянам. По мнению служащих новозеландских ВВС, речь могла идти не о летающих тарелках, а о необычном положении Венеры или своеобразном отражении света.
Как рассказали представители ВВС Новой Зеландии, перед тем, как рассекретить документы, военные ведомства удалили из них имена свидетелей полетов НЛО над Землей и другие личные данные. Военные подчеркнули, что содержание обнародованных материалов не будет официально комментироваться.
Всего рассекреченными оказались более двух тысяч страниц документов. Тем не менее, оригиналы материалов об НЛО, оказавшихся в распоряжении властей Новой Зеландии, по-прежнему будут оставаться недоступными для широкой публики. Многие из бумаг об НЛО будут оставаться в архивах до 2080 года.

description.hltext_display: كتلة الاحرار ترشح علي دواي لمنصب محافظ ميسان
description.content:
ميسان/ أصوات العراق: كشف عضو مجلس محافظة ميسان عن كتلة الأحرار عامر نصر الله ، الثلاثاء، ان كتلته رشحت عضو مجلس المحافظة السابق علي دواي لشغل منصب المحافظ الذي كان يشغله وزير حقوق الانسان الجديد، وفقا لاتفاق بين بين قائمتي دولة القانون والاحرار. واوضح نصر الله لوكالة ( أصوات العراق) ان ?مجلس محافظة ميسان سيصوت خلال الايام القليلة المقبلة على مرشحهم الوحيد لشغل منصب المحافظ� رئيس لجنة النزاهة بالمجلس السابق علي دواي� بدلا من محمد شياع السوداني الذي حصل على منصب وزير حقوق الإنسان في الحكومة العراقية? . وأشار الى ان ?عملية التصويت ستكون حسب الاتفاق المبرم بين ائتلاف دولة القانون الذي يترأسه المالكي وكتلة الاحرار خلال عملية تشكيل الحكومة والذي تضمن عدة مطاليب من بينها� تنازل الائتلاف عن منصب المحافظ لصالح الصدريين مقابل ترشيحهم للمالكي رئيسا للوزراء عن التحالف الوطني ?. يذكر ان مجلس ميسان يتكون من 27 عضوا ، ثمانية أعضاء من كل من قائمتي ائتلاف دولة القانون وشهيد المحراب وسبعة من كتلة الأحرار وأربعة اعضاء من تيار الإصلاح الوطني . وتقع مدينة العمارة، مركز محافظة ميسان، على مسافة 390 كم إلى الجنوب من العاصمة بغداد.
ي ر (خ) – د س ك

description.hltext_display: How To Find The Perfect Tenants
description.author: Susan Edmunds
description.content:
In some ways, buying a rental property is the easy bit. When it comes to managing the investment, and dealing with tenants, things can get a bit harder. Many investors, often with cost-savings in mind, take the DIY approach but professional property managers say in some cases that can be a false economy.
Because they work full-time in the industry, most property managers have access to information and expertise beyond the reach of regular investors. They will know what the market value of a property is* and review it regularly to keep it at that level and often have contacts to enable them to get good deals when repairs and maintenance are needed. They are also usually able to devote more time to finding tenants and dealing with any issues that arise with the property.
Property manager Angela Barraclough, of Harveys, tells Suite 101 because most people are so busy with work and other commitments, having someone to tackle the day-to-day management of a rental can be a huge benefit. She always has her cellphone switched on, so she can quickly deal with any issues. We do it full time, everyone else is so busy, they dont have time to drop everything to attend to problems. She even sometimes gets texts from prospective tenants at 1am and replies to them first thing in the morning.
Aside from dealing with the everyday issues of having a rental property, she says a good property manager can also save landlords from making legal mistakes, or missing out on a good tenant due to an unprofessional approach.
A lot of people trying to let rental properties forget about the most basic premise: that they should show respect to their tenants, she says. Im astounded by the number of people who are just horrible, she says. Ive had tenants take properties that are dearer than they wanted, and not quite ideal for them, purely because I smile at them and treat them with respect. Similarly, some landlords do not realise what questions they can and cannot ask. She says she was dealing with an applicant for one property with good references, and who checked out well but who backed out when the landlord asked her about her love life and drinking habits. Lots of owners dont realise whats appropriate with their questions the legal side is something a lot of them underestimate. A good property manager can be the mediator in the middle, making sure both sides stick to their obligations.
Whether they have a property manager or not, investors should make sure all dealings are business-like and professional. Responding to phone calls quickly indicates to prospective tenants that the landlord will be easy to get hold of if there are problems during the tenancy and good record-keeping is invaluable in the case of disputes, or missed rent payments.
Most rental properties are advertised online, or in the newspaper. As with a property for sale, good photos will attract interest. In the advertisement, outline the benefits of the property, such as its outdoor living areas, new bathroom, or good school zones. But dont exaggerate: It is better for potential tenants to be pleasantly surprised when they arrive, than a bit disappointed.
If possible, keep the house clean, tidy, dry and well ventilated. In winter, put the heating on before people come through. Avoid spending too much money on renovating, as it might mean the rent you have to charge to recoup the costs ends up being too high, in comparison to other houses in the neighbourhood. Replacing the curtains or putting in a new shower curtain are quick ways to update the appearance of the house and keep it looking tidy.
A bathroom and kitchen that are clean and crisp are fine theres no need for the appliances or fittings to be top-of-the-line or brand new. But a house that is in good condition and looks like it has been looked after is more likely to be kept that way by tenants.
Use any downtime in between tenants to get the house professionally cleaned, or to add a new coat of paint. Take care of any quick fixes that need doing: tenants may think that neglected repairs are indicative of a disinterested landlord.
Angela says it is critically important to do credit checks on all prospective tenants. The standard pre-tenancy application form gives landlords permission to conduct the check. I dont know how you go without it. Another thing I do is phone the employer and ask if they do actually work there and get an overall opinion of the type of person, how reliable they are and so on. An application isnt necessarily turned down if there is a blot on the applicants credit record. Its more how they reactoften the fact theyve been upfront with me [about things that will turn up on the credit check] means theyre honest. If the prospective tenants are moving out of home for the first time, Angela calls their parents. Some will say youll need to keep on top of them about this and this it doesnt mean Id turn someone down. Property managers develop a kind of inbuilt alarm system, with time and experience, she says. Its very effective, you know instinctively its important not to ignore it. Angela says shes only been disappointed twice in her more than eight years in the job. Landlords shouldnt be afraid to wait for the right tenant. A bad tenant can cost way more than hanging out a couple more weeks. For that reason, she says the owners of rental properties should always have a buffer of saved cash to tide them over. This can also be useful if rent does not go in as expected. Owners should assume a property will be empty for at least a couple of weeks every year.
Be specific about when the rent will be paid, and into which account. Using the Tenancy Tribunal-approved tenancy agreement (available from the Department of Building and Housing) makes the obligations of each side clear. At signing, outline any restrictions specific to the property. It can be a good idea to arrange fixed-term agreements so they come up for renewal at peak times, such as March, rather than just before Christmas or in the middle of winter, when it may be harder to find tenants.
Once the property is let, checking on tenants every couple of months or so, with a phone call or email, can help keep on top of any problems before they escalate.
Angela says the quality of tenants has improved enormously over the past five years. Location makes the biggest difference to how easy it is to rent a property but how quickly a house will be tenanted is hard to predict. There are slow pockets and then the phone starts ringing, and two or three people all want the same place, its quite weird. * market rents can be found at www.dbh.govt.nz

event_or_fact.property: it is critically important to do credit checks on all prospective tenants
Property managers develop a kind of inbuilt alarm system, with time and experience
Im astounded by the number of people who are just horrible
she was dealing with an applicant for one property with good references, and who checked out well but who backed out when the landlord asked her about her love life and drinking habits
101 because most people are so busy with work and other commitments, having someone to tackle the day-to-day management of a rental can be a huge benefit
A lot of people trying to let rental properties forget about the most basic premise: that they should show respect to their tenants
the owners of rental properties should always have a buffer of saved cash to tide them over
a good property manager can also save landlords from making legal mistakes, or missing out on a good tenant due to an unprofessional approach
shes only been disappointed twice in her more than eight years in the job
the quality of tenants has improved enormously over the past five years

description.hltext_display: OTT boost as Apple TV hits million mark
description.author: Joseph.ohalloran@eurotvguild.com (Editor
description.content:
It may not be selling in iPhone or iPad proportions but Apple TV can be considered a success after sales of the OTT video device are set to pass the one million mark by Christmas 2010.
What makes the news sweeter for Apple is that its success comes only days after OTT video rival Google announced that it had to put on hold plans to extend its Google TV service to leading TV manufacturers.
Analysts have spent the months since launch doubting whether AppleTV, and indeed Google TV, could be a success. TV has been a self-proclaimed niche for the company, particularly as Apple found itself undercut in pricing and simplicity in its offerings by rivals such as Boxee and Roku.
In a briefing in November 2010, Informa Telecoms & Media predicted that by the end of 2011 the TV industry will be much closer to knowing whether online video plays such as Google TV, Apple TV, Canvas and HbbTV were are game-changers or, as it said, “simply another case of the Emperor's New Clothes.”
Furthermore, assessing the effect that the launch of Google TV could have in terms of the prospects for OTT video as a whole, and Apple TV in particular, IMS Senior Analyst Paul Erickson, said: “Google TV fundamentally differs from Apple TV in that its scale is larger and less constrained; it has tight integration of live TV, OTT video, and Internet-driven search and applications, either in set-top box form or integrated into your TV. Without careful re-imagining of what Apple TV’s value proposition will be within this new OTT competitive landscape that Google TV will occupy at the high end, Apple’s 'hobby' is likely to remain such.”
Enjoying the moment, Apple says that Apple TV offers the simplest way to watch HD movies and TV shows, and to stream content from Netflix, YouTube, Flickr and MobileMe. It adds that iTunes users are now renting and purchasing over 400,000 TV episodes and over 150,000 movies per day.

event_or_fact.property: ?Google TV fundamentally differs from Apple TV in that its scale is larger and less constrained; it has tight integration of live TV, OTT video, and Internet-driven search and applications, either in set-top box form or integrated into your TV

description.hltext_display: Kinderpfleger vergriff sich an mehreren Jungen
description.content:
Ein Pfleger soll in einem Berliner Krankenhaus mehrere Jungen sexuell missbraucht und davon Filmaufnahmen gemacht haben. Die Staatsanwaltschaft ermittelt gegen den 27-Jährigen wegen schweren sexuellen Missbrauchs in drei Fällen, wie ein Behördensprecher sagte. Das Klinikum sprach von fünf Fällen. Es seien noch nicht alle Namen ermittelt. Die Staatsanwaltschaft hält weitere Fälle für möglich.
Der Pfleger, der auf einer Kinderintensivstation im Helios-Klinikum im Stadtteil Buch arbeitete, sei bereits am Freitag verhaftet worden, hieß es weiter. Zuvor hatte ein mutmaßlich betroffener neun Jahre alter Junge seinen Eltern von den Taten erzählt. In Untersuchungshaft habe der Mann versucht, sich das Leben zu nehmen. Er sei nun in medizinischer Behandlung.
Die Anklagebehörde wirft ihm vor, in dem Krankenhaus neben dem Neunjährigen auch einen weiteren Jungen missbraucht zu haben, der sich nicht wehren konnte. Nach der Festnahme fanden die Ermittler Handy-Aufnahmen der Taten.
"Wir sind entsetzt und fassungslos", teilte das Klinikum mit. "Wir bedauern zutiefst das Leid, aber auch die Ungewissheit, die jetzt viele Eltern und Patienten quält, selbst wenn sie nicht betroffen sind oder waren." Eltern, deren Söhne in den vergangenen 14 Monaten Patienten der Kinderintensivstation waren, seien in einem Brief über die Ermittlungen informiert worden.

description.hltext_display: China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced its top Foreign Ministry official amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, meaning he outranks Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focussing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.

event_or_fact.property: in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world
Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.

description.hltext_display: Дэвид Хэй принял условия Владимира Кличко
description.content:
Хэй подчеркнул, что теперь никаких препятствий для подписания контракта на бой нет. По словам британского боксера, владеющего титулом чемпиона мира по версии WBA (Всемирная боксерская ассоциация), он согласился поделить доходы от телетрансляции пополам, несмотря на то что показ боя в Великобритании принесет больше денег, чем показ в Германии.
Однако, как отмечает издание boxingscene.com, в ходе переговоров возникло новое препятствие. В Германии бои братьев Кличко транслирует канал RTL, а промоутерская компания Sauerland Event, владеющая частью прав на организацию боев Хэя, имеет контракт с каналом ARD.
Как рассказал менеджер братьев Кличко Бернд Бенте, команда Хэя считает, что ARD готов заплатить за показ боя Кличко - Хэй больше, чем RTL. В этой связи представители Хэя хотят, чтобы Кличко покрыл разницу между предложениями телеканалов.
По словам Бенте, он не верит, что ARD действительно готов сделать более выгодное предложение. Кроме того, братья Кличко в любом случае намерены выполнить контракт с RTL, который рассчитан еще на два их боя. Этими боями, скорее всего, станут поединок Виталия Кличко с кубинцем Одланьером Солисом, запланированный ориентировочно на март, и следующий бой Владимира Кличко.
11 декабря Кличко-младший должен был драться с британцем Дереком Чисорой, но за несколько дней до боя получил травму. По условиям контракта, у Кличко есть месяц, чтобы определиться с соперником. Если до 11 января он не подпишет контракт на бой с другим боксером, то будет должен встретиться с Чисорой.

description.hltext_display: سالزبورغ مدينة الموسيقى وموتسارت وفريق ريد بول
description.content: أكثر ما تشتهر به مدينة سالزبورغ النمساوية هي الموسيقى، فأشهر من انجبته المدينة هو الموسيقار العبقري فولفجانج أماديوس موتسارت وفيلم «صوت الموسيقى» الغنائي الشهير الذي يروي قصة أسرة فون تراب المحبة للغناء. وفي الصيف، يسيطر مهرجان سالزبورغ الموسيقي على أجواء المدينة كلها، ويجذب محبي الموسيقى الكلاسيكية من كل أنحاء العالم. ولكي يبدأ أحد السائحين زيارته إلى سالزبورغ، عليه أن يبدأ بجولة في شارع جيترايديجاسه العتيق، وفي هذا الشارع سيجد الزائر لافتة تشير إلى محل ميلاد موتسارت في المنزل رقم 9. وإذا أكمل الزائر مسيرته إلى الإمام سيصل إلى ميدان ريزيدينتسبلاتس. ويمكن للزائر إذا شعر بالتعب من المشي أن يستريح في إحدى المقاهي الموجودة بالشارع مثل فيورستس أو كافيه توماسيلي، ثم يكمل مشواره نحو كاتدرائية ريزيدينتسبلاتس. أما الزائرون أصحاب النزعة الرياضية فيمكنهم محاولة المشي نحو قلعة هوهنسالزبورغ. وأثناء سيرهم لأعلى للوصول إلى القلعة، يمكنهم التوقف بفندق شتايجلبراو. إن لم يكن لتناول البيرة المحلية الخاصة بالمدينة فليكن من أجل مشاهدة أسطح منازل المدينة من هذا المكان المرتفع. وبعبور نهر سالزاخ من فوق جسر «شتاتسبرويكه» أو أحد جسور المشاة الأخرى المنتشرة بطول النهر، ينتقل الزائر إلى الجانب الأهدأ من سالزبورغ. وحول قصر «ميرابيل» يوجد العديد من العاملين الذين يعرضون على السائح اصطحابه في جولة إلى مواقع التصوير الحقيقية لفيلم «صوت الموسيقى» التي صور عام 5691 داخل وحول مدينة سالزبورغ. ويمكن للسائر أن يسير في نفس الطرقات التي سارت بها بطلة الفيلم الشهيرة جولي أندروز وأن يتسلق بعض الجبال والمرتفعات الخضراء بالمكان. كما ينصح بزيارة قصر هيلبرون المشهور بنافوراته العديدة، أو قضاء أمسية في مصنع مويلن للبيرة الذي يتمتع بحديقة رائعة لتناول البيرة. ويعرف جمهور كرة القدم مدينة سالزبورغ من خلال فريقها المحلي، ريد بول، الذي أصبح يحمل هذا الاسم بعد شراء الشركة المصنعة لمشروب الطاقة الشهير للفريق في عام 2005 . وبمساعدة ميزانيته المالية الضخمة والعديد من النجوم باهظي الثمن فاز الفريق بلقب بطولة الدوري النمساوي عام 2006 . ويقع استاد سالزبورغ في شارع فالز- سيزنهايم، ويعتبر الوصول إليه من قلب المدينة صعب إلى حد ما، لذلك قد يستغرق الزائر بعض الوقت في الوصول إليه. اما الوصول إلى المدينة نفسها فهو أيسر سواء عن طريق الطائرة أو القطار أو السيارة، حيث تقع على طريق رئيسي يربط الشرق بالغرب ويمتد من النمسا إلى جارتها ألمانيا. وستقام مناطق المشجعين في قلب المدينة القديمة بالقرب من ميدان ريزيدينتسبلاتس والكاتدرائية الموجودة بالميدان. ويتوقع المنظمون وصول عدد المشجعين إلى 52 ألف متفرج في هذا الميدان في أيام المباريات. وتتمركز حياة الليل في سالزبورغ حول منطقة رودلفسكاي. ويجب لفت الانتباه هنا إلى أن سالزبورغ ليست مكاناً رخيصاً، لذلك يجب على زائرها أن يؤمن نفسه بميزانية كافية قبل التوجه إليها والتنزه فيها. فيينا (د ب أ) - «الحواس الخمس» أم عبدالله - الإمارات حسونة السيد - مصر ابو احمد - الإمارات زيد - العراق ابو احمد - الإمارات

description.hltext_display: Hoffnung für Flugverkehr - A1 wieder frei
description.content:
Etwas weniger Verkehrschaos und dazu Aussichten auf weiße Weihnachten: Am Dienstag haben sich die Auswirkungen des mit viel Schnee und Eis verbundenen Winters in Deutschland zumindest etwas abgemildert. Bei Schneeräumarbeiten für die in der Kritik stehenden Bahn wurden drei Männer getötet. Seit Tagen sind Luft-, Bahn- und Straßenverkehr in Deutschland durch Schnee und Eis massiv beeinträchtigt.
Unterdessen ist die Autobahn 1 zwischen Schwerte und Unna ist seit dem späten Abend wieder frei. Das Fahrverbot hatte vorsichtshalber gegolten, da eine über die Autobahn führende Brücke abgesackt war. Experten stellten aber fest, dass das Bauwerk doch keine Gefahr für den Verkehr unter ihr bedeute und nicht einsturzgefährdet sei. Das teilte der Landesbetrieb für Straßenbau mit. Warum die Brücke südlich von Holzwickede nachgegeben hatte, war aber auch am späten Dienstagabend noch unklar. Statiker sollen das klären.
Ungeachtet des erneuten Wintereinbruchs will die Lufthansa indessen ab heute wieder zu ihrem regulären Flugplan zurückkehren. Die positiven Wetterprognosen machten es möglich, den seit dem Wochenende geltenden Sonderflugplan zu beenden, sagte Lufthansa-Sprecher Jachnow. Bis auf Ziele, die wegen schlechter Wetterbedingungen nur eingeschränkt angeflogen werden können, sollten heute alle internationalen Flüge durchgeführt werden. Mit Behinderungen müsse jedoch noch bei Flügen nach London-Heathrow gerechnet werden. Wegen des Passagierrückstaus rief die Airline ihre Passagiere jedoch dazu auf, nach Möglichkeit andere Verkehrsmittel zu nutzen. Außerdem sollten Reisende mindestens drei Stunden vor dem Start am Flughafen sein.
Fraport-Sprecher wagt keine Prognose Am wichtigsten deutschen Flughafen in Frankfurt am Main deutet sich am Mittwochmorgen langsam eine Entspannung an. Alle Start- und Landebahnen waren am Morgen in Betrieb, sagte ein Sprecher des Betreibers Fraport . "Es deutet alles darauf hin, dass sich die Dinge entspannen. Die Überhänge vom Dienstagabend sind fast abgebaut", sagte er. Die weitere Entwicklung hänge aber nicht allein vom Frankfurter Flughafen ab, sondern auch von der Leistungsfähigkeit der anderen europäischen Airports.
Tauwetter setzt von Süden ein Auch ohne neuen Schnee gab es laut Fraport am Mittwochmorgen Sichtbehinderungen auf dem Flughafen. Hunderte Passagiere hatten die Nacht wieder im Flughafengebäude auf Feldbetten verbracht - allein im Transitbereich waren es 350 Menschen. Der Großteil der Wartenden ließ sich die Nacht über in Hotels einquartieren, teilweise 70 Kilometer außerhalb der Stadt. Wie viele von ihnen nun schon mehrere Nächte am Stück auf einen Flug warten, konnte der Fraport-Sprecher nicht sagen.
Temperaturen über dem Gefrierpunkt bringen Schnee und Eis zumindest in Süddeutschland vielerorts zum Schmelzen. "Im Norden kalt, im Süden mild", bilanzierte der Deutsche Wetterdienst DWD im hessischen Offenbach am frühen Mittwoch. Mit Stand von 4.00 Uhr am Morgen lagen die Temperaturen in Konstanz, Stuttgart und Frankfurt am Main im Plusbereich. In München waren es null, in Nürnberg minus ein Grad. Köln und Dresden lagen mit einem Grad geradeso im Plus.
Leichter Schneefall an Heilig Abend Weiter gen Norden wurde es kälter, beispielsweise mit minus sechs Grad in Hannover, minus sieben Grad in Bremen und Rostock, minus fünf in Hamburg und minus acht Grad in Berlin. Dieses Temperaturgefälle zwischen Nord und Süd soll laut DWD-Prognose generell anhalten, wobei jedoch die milderen Temperaturen in die Mitte Deutschlands vorrücken.
In Baden-Württemberg und Bayern war das Tauwetter schon am frühen Morgen vielerorts zu beobachten, wie eine Umfrage bei den größeren Polizeidienststellen ergab. Leichte Plusgrade gab es fast überall. Für den Heiligabend am Freitag sagt der DWD für weite Teile Deutschlands leichten Schneefall voraus. Bei Temperaturen um den Gefrierpunkt soll es zunächst am Vormittag in Berlin, Frankfurt/Main, Stuttgart und München noch Regen oder Schneeregen geben, zum Abend hin wird es dann laut Prognose aber deutschlandweit leicht schneien.

description.hltext_display: Cotecna launches electronic tracking system for transit goods
description.author: info@compassnewspaper.com ( Nigerian Compass
description.content:
Cotecna Togo, a subsidiary of the world’s leading trade inspection, security and certification company, has signed a fresh contract with the Togolese Ministry for the Economy and Finance for the tracking of declared goods in transit throughout the Togolese territory.
The company was commissioned to set up and manage a remote tracking system for land transport across the national territory using an electronic tracking system based on GPS/GSM/GPRS mobile tags.
The five-year contract, known as SSE, will be launched on June 1, 2011 and covers goods in transit throughout the Togolese territory.
The company’s partnership with the government of Togo stretches back to an Import Verification Programme in 1995. This programme has been constantly updated to keep up with the modernization of Togolese Customs, and in 2003 saw the installation of a first scanner combined with a computerized risk management system, CRMS.
In 2006, the inspection programme evolved to a destination inspection programme in order to speed up Customs clearance. In November 2009, Cotecna unveiled a new Gantry HCV 6034 6MeV scanner in Lomé’s port. This powerful scanner can distinguish between organic and inorganic matter and detects radioactive substances.
In Nigeria, Cotecna has a seven-year Build, Operate, Own and Transfer Destination Inspection contract with the Federal Government. Under the contract, Cotecna is in charge of Apapa and Tin Can ports, Abuja and Kano airports, and Jibiya and Banki border posts and accordingly carries out Risk Management and Inspection activities on all goods imported into Nigeria.
Founded in Switzerland in 1974, the company offers a wide range of trade facilitation services, trade security services and quality certification standards. Cotecna is a pioneer in areas such as risk management, destination inspection and scanner integration projects and also offers Customs modernization programmes, Customs valuation assistance, trade security solutions and commercial inspections. For a full description of our services, please visit www.cotecna.com. The Cotecna Group has a combined workforce of about 4,000 employees and agents in close to 100 offices.

entity.property: Togolese Ministry for the Economy and Finance

description.hltext_display: Harry Follett: How to Keep Gas Bills low as Prices Rise Again -- 5 Helpful Suggestions from Home DIY Tips
description.author: General News UK
description.content:
General News UK
As the cold weather keeps Brits at home, a surge in the demand for gas has triggered a rise in wholesale prices. In this article, leading DIY blog 'Home DIY Tips' have published 5 handy suggestions to help home owners keep their houses warm and their bills low this Christmas.
As heavy snow continues to fall across the UK, demand for gas hit an all time high yesterday, beating the former record by over 2.5 million cubic metres. With hundreds of flights cancelled, roads in chaos and several schools closed across the UK, hundreds of thousands of Brits are choosing to stay at home.
Although representatives from the National Grid have assured the public that supplies of gas are readily available, the surge in demand has triggered yet another rise in wholesale prices, which went up by 11% to 75p per therm. This has come as the second blow to households this year after energy companies announced that they would be raising gas bills to keep up with inflation.
Leading DIY blog ‘Home DIY Tips’ has put together three handy suggestions, to help homeowners keep their houses warm and their gas bills low this Christmas.
1. Line the Floors: If you have any carpets lying around the house, bring them downstairs. Since heat rises, it is often ground floor living rooms which feel the blow when temperatures fall. A set of thick rugs will keep your feet warm, absorb drafts and trap heat by the sofa where people may gather.
2. Keep out the drafts: A lot of heat is lost from homes through small gaps under front and back doors. By placing a couple of draft excluders at the bottom of each exterior door, you will notice the difference immediately. These simple devices can either be bought cheaply or made out of old scraps of carpet.
3. Keep the heat in: Especially in older homes, a lot of heat seeps out through windows. In buildings with eroded window frames or loosely fitted panes, we recommend that you seal your windows with cling film – it may sound strange but it definitely works.
4. Dig out your woollies: With winter upon us, now is the time to dig out the thick blankets, knitted jumpers and ski socks buried away in the loft. It may sound obvious but wearing the right clothes might keep you away from the expensive temptation of turning up the thermostat.
5. Finally, harsh weather is a perfect excuse for snuggling up on the sofa with a hot chocolate and a loved one. Every snow cloud has a silver lining!
A Merry Christmas and a happy snow-in from Home DIY tips.
See the original story at: http://www.prweb.com/releases/enjoysnowysofaheaven/thischristmas/prweb4913824.htm

description.hltext_display: Nike wird mehr Schuhe und Klamotten los
description.content:
Schuhe und Bekleidung von Nike sind begehrt. Der weltgrößte Hersteller von Sportartikeln verbuchte im zweiten Geschäftsquartal (Ende November) einen um 10 Prozent höheren Umsatz von 4,8 Milliarden Dollar (3,7 Mrd Euro). Der Gewinn stieg im Vergleich zum Vorjahreszeitraum sogar um 22 Prozent auf 457 Millionen Dollar.
"Fast jede Marke, jede Produktgattung und jede Region hat zugelegt", sagte Konzernchef Mark Parker in Beaverton (US-Bundesstaat Oregon). Vor allem die Menschen in Nordamerika und in den Schwellenländern griffen zu Nike-Produkten. Dagegen hielten sich die Westeuropäer und vor allem die Japaner zurück.
Obgleich der Adidas- und Puma-Rivale mit seinem Abschneiden die Erwartungen der Börsianer übertroffen hatte, fiel der Kurs um 5 Prozent. Beobachter schoben dies auf die Enttäuschung über die eingegangenen Bestellungen für Dezember bis April. Diese stiegen um 11 Prozent auf 7,7 Milliarden Dollar. Analysten hatten mit einem noch höheren Zuwachs gerechnet.
Nike kämpft um Fußball-Markt Für Nike ist Wachstum enorm wichtig. Adidas hat sich zum Ziel gesetzt, den US-Rivalen zu überholen. Der Adidas-Umsatz soll bis 2015 um 45 bis 50 Prozent auf 17 Milliarden Euro steigen. Das will Firmenchef Herbert Hainer nicht zuletzt durch zahlreiche neue Filialen erreichen, insbesondere in den boomenden Schwellenländern.
Auch Nike wächst in den Schwellenländern mit China an der Spitze rasant. Parallel versuchen die Amerikaner, auf dem wichtigen europäischen Fußball-Markt Fuß zu fassen. Nike hatte vor gut zwei Jahren den schwächelnden britischen Sportartikel-Hersteller Umbro gekauft und damit sein Standbein in der alten Welt gestärkt.

description.hltext_display: Romo’s season officially over
description.content:
With time running out on this season, the Dallas Cowboys told injured quarterback Tony Romo he might as well rest up for next season.
Romo went on injured reserve Tuesday, eliminating any chance of him playing Saturday night at Arizona or in the season finale at Philadelphia. Hes been out since breaking his left collarbone Oct. 25.When you just start doing the math on it and say, Where is he with this injury? Where is he physically functioning? Where is he being able to take a hit? And then, how much practice time you need to have any player be ready to play in a game? interim coach Jason Garrett said. We just felt when we factored all those things together, it just made sense to make this move.It seemed silly for the Cowboys to take any chances since they cant make the playoffs and are guaranteed a losing record, though they kept the option open by carrying him on the active roster the last eight weeks. Garrett said having this weekend as a target for a return helped Romo with his recovery.
On Sunday, team owner Jerry Jones said Romo was still having sensitivity there and not ready to play. Garrett indicated Romo would try to practice Tuesday, but the move was announced before the club even hit the field.
Jon Kitna will start the final two games. Garrett said he wouldnt use second-year backup Stephen McGee unless Kitna is hurt.
MCNABB SAYS HE FEELS DISRESPECTEDQuarterback Donovan McNabb said he felt disrespected by the way he was benched by Redskins coach Mike Shanahan.Everything was handled awkwardly, McNabb said on his weekly radio show, somewhat to a disrespect to me and to the team.EXTRA POINTS
San Francisco coach Mike Singletary has made up his mind on who will be his starting quarterback Sunday, but he isnt saying if it will be Troy Smith or Alex Smith. ? The Bengals placed Terrell Owens on season-ending injured reserve a day after the receiver had surgery to repair cartilage in his left knee. ... Denver linebacker Kevin Alexander pleaded not guilty to charges of assault and battery stemming from an allegation of a domestic dispute over alleged infidelity, a day after he was arrested and cut from the team. ... The Cleveland Browns placed linebacker Scott Fujita and cornerback Eric Wright on injured reserve. The Browns also signed nose tackle Travis Ivey from the practice squad and free agent linebacker Steve Octavien. Fullback Tyler Clutts was signed to the practice squad. ... Coach Mike Tomlin concedes the Steelers were mistakenly awarded a first down on a 9-yard run by Rashard Mendenhall during their 22-17 loss to the Jets on Sunday. ... The Oakland Raiders signed former UFL punter Danny Baugher to their practice squad as insurance if Shane Lechler is unable to play this week.

description.hltext_display: الجبهة التركمانية العراقية : كنا نأمل الحصول على وزارتين و منصب سيادي
description.content:
كركوك / أصوات العراق : قالت مسؤولة الدائرة الإعلامية للجبهة التركمانية العراقية، الثلاثاء، إن الجبهة كانت تأمل ان يحصل التركمان على وزارتين و منصب سيادي في الحكومة الجديدة. وأوضحت نرمين المفتي لوكالة ( أصوات العراق ) ان الجبهة التركمانية ?كانت تأمل الحصول على وزارتين الخدمية و للدولة ، بالإضافة إلى منصب سيادي ، ولكن التركمان حصلوا بحسب النقاط على وزارة خدمية وهي وزارة الشباب ووزارة للدولة?. وأضافت أن ?رئيس الجمهورية وعدنا أن يكون النائب الثالث لسيادته من القومية التركمانية، ونأمل أن يتحقق الوعد وأن يكون النائب الثالث للرئيس من التركمان وان يكون من نصيب الجبهة التركمانية?. وإشارت إلى أن ?الجبهة التركمانية تعمل في الساحة السياسية منذ عام 1995 وأثبتت جدارتها ولدينا 6 نواب في مجلس النواب العراقي، والمهم اننا دخلنا العملية السياسية بقوة وبموافقة جميع الإطراف السياسية الموجودة، نحن عملنا وحصلنا على الثمار ولكن ليس بالمستوى المطلوب ?. وكان النائب التركماني في ائتلاف العراقية ارشد الصالحي قال لوكالة (أصوات العراق) إن “رئيس الجهورية جلال الطالباني وإثناء لقائه ببرلمانيين من التركمان يوم� 28 / 11 /2010 أبدى تأييده لمطالبنا بشأن الحصول على منصب سيادي في الحكومة مثل نائب رئيس الجمهورية او نائب رئيس الوزراء?. وأضاف أن طالباني ذكر ان الموضوع “ينبغي أن يسن له قانون خاص في البرلمان العراقي وسوف أؤيدكم عند طرح ذلك في مجلس النواب وسأكون أول المدافعين عن التركمان لحصولهم على احد المناصب السيادية لانهم تضرروا كثيرا أو أكثر من الآخرين ?. وتقع مدينة كركوك على بعد 280 كم شمال شرق العاصمة بغداد .
ك ك (خ) – د س ك
